original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sems can gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /
translated: the ultimate of the realm of sentient beings, the ultimate of the realm of the world, the ultimate of the realm of space, the ultimate of the realm of phenomena, the ultimate of the realm of nirvāṇa,

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang /🔽'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud @87a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams kyi mthar thug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud @87a *//
translated: the ultimate of the realm of the appearance of buddhas, the ultimate of the realm of the wisdom of the tathāgatas, the ultimate of the realm of the focus of mind, the ultimate of the realm of the accomplishment of wisdom,

original: kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dag go ///
analyzed: kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dag go ///
translated: the ultimate of the realm of the continuum of the world, the ultimate of the realm of the continuum of phenomena, and the ultimate of the realm of the continuum of wisdom.

original: bam po bzhi bcu drug pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu drug pa /
translated: PART IV

original: de ltar smon lam chen po 'di dag sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig /🔽smon lam chen po 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang /
analyzed: de ltar smon lam chen po 'di dag sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig / smon lam chen po 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang /
translated: May these great aspirations reach the very limits of the realms of sentient beings.🔽May these great aspirations reach the very limits of the realms of the world, of space, of the Dharma, of nirvana, of the appearance of the buddhas, of the wisdom of the tathagatas,

original: sems can gyi dmigs pa'i khams dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can gyi dmigs pa'i khams dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams kyi mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthar thug par gyur cig /
translated: of the realms of sentient beings, of the accomplishment of wisdom, of the realms of the continuity of the world, of the continuity of the Dharma, and of the continuity of wisdom.

original: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mthar thug pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mthar thug pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i khams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi khams dang /
translated: In the same way, these great aspirations are infinite, just as the realms of sentient beings are infinite, and the realms of world systems, space, phenomena, nirvāṇa, the appearance of buddhas, the wisdom of the tathāgatas,

original: sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams mthar thug pa med pa de bzhin du smon lam chen po 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa med par gyur te /
analyzed: sems kyi dmigs pa'i khams dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i khams dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud dang / chos kyi rgyud dang / ye shes kyi rgyud kyi khams mthar thug pa med pa de bzhin du smon lam chen po 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa med par gyur te /
translated: the realms of mental objects, the realms of the accomplishment of wisdom, the realms of worldly continuums, the realms of Dharma continuums, and the realms of wisdom continuums are infinite.

original: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba @87b 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa med par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba @87b 'di dag kyang mthar thug pa med par gyur cig /
translated: May my roots of virtue also be infinite.”

original: ces de ltar smon lam shin tu bsgrubs shing /🔽phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ces de ltar smon lam shin tu bsgrubs shing / phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: In this way, he accomplishes his aspirations.🔽He has a helpful attitude.

original: 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: He has a gentle attitude.

original: las su rung ba'i sems dang ldan pa /🔽zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa /🔽dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: las su rung ba'i sems dang ldan pa / zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa / dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They have a mind that is fit for action.🔽They have a mind that is peaceful.🔽They have a mind that is disciplined.

original: nye bar zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They have a mind that is tranquil.

original: gnyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gnyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They have a mind that is friendly.🔽They have a mind that is loving.

original: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa; 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa; 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They have a mind that is not agitated.🔽They have a mind that is not disturbed.

original: glong ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ni legs par rtog pa mang zhing dad pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: glong ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ni legs par rtog pa mang zhing dad pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: They have many good thoughts and are full of faith.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyud la yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyud la yid ches pa yin /
translated: They have faith in the continuum of the bodhisattva conduct that was accomplished by the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas of the past.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsdu ba la yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsdu ba la yid ches pa yin /
translated: They have faith in the perfection of the bodhisattvas.

original: sa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / khyad par du 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: sa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / khyad par du 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
translated: They have faith in the accomplishment of the bhūmis and the special qualities.

original: stobs yongs su 'grub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: stobs yongs su 'grub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
translated: They have faith in the accomplishment of the strengths.

original: mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi 'phrogs pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la mngon par yid ches pa yin / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi 'phrogs pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
translated: He has full confidence in the perfection of fearlessness.🔽He has full confidence in the unassailability of the Buddhas’ special qualities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
translated: He has full confidence in the inconceivable qualities of the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
translated: He has full confidence in the accomplishment of the Buddhas’ object, which is without limit or center.

original: de @88a *// bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: de @88a *// bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
translated: He has full confidence in the practice of the Tathāgata’s infinite domain.

original: 'bras bu yongs su grub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
analyzed: 'bras bu yongs su grub pa la mngon par yid ches pa yin /
translated: He has full confidence in the accomplishment of the result.

original: mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang / ye shes kyi bar du shin tu bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mngon par yid ches pa yin no //
analyzed: mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang / ye shes kyi bar du shin tu bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mngon par yid ches pa yin no //
translated: In brief, he has full confidence in the entire bodhisattva practice, up to the teaching of the stages of the Tathāgata and the wisdom of the Tathāgata.

original: yang de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: yang de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks to himself:

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar zab la de ltar dben zhing de ltar zhi ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar zab la de ltar dben zhing de ltar zhi ba ste /
translated: These qualities of the Buddha are so vast, so profound, so secluded, so peaceful,

original: de ltar stong la de ltar mtshan ma med cing /
analyzed: de ltar stong la de ltar mtshan ma med cing /
translated: so empty, so signless,

original: de ltar smon pa med la /
analyzed: de ltar smon pa med la /
translated: so wishless,🔽so free of attachment,

original: de ltar chags pa med de /🔽de ltar gos pa med cing /
analyzed: de ltar chags pa med de / de ltar gos pa med cing /
translated: so unstained,

original: de ltar tshad med la /
analyzed: de ltar tshad med la /
translated: so immeasurable, and so powerful.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag de ltar rlabs che na 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag lta ba ngan par lhung ba'i rgyud dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag dang / rab rib kyi thibs pos kun nas khebs pa'i yid dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag de ltar rlabs che na 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag lta ba ngan par lhung ba'i rgyud dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag dang / rab rib kyi thibs pos kun nas khebs pa'i yid dang /
translated: And yet, the minds of ordinary, foolish beings are caught up in the causes of falling into bad views, obscured by the darkness of ignorance and the gloom of blindness,

original: nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba'i yongs su rtog pa dang / sred pa'i dra bas mngon par ye rngam pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sgyu dang g-yo'i thibs po la rjes su spyod pa'i sems dang / bsam pa dang / phrag dog dang /
analyzed: nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba'i yongs su rtog pa dang / sred pa'i dra bas mngon par ye rngam pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sgyu dang g-yo'i thibs po la rjes su spyod pa'i sems dang / bsam pa dang / phrag dog dang /
translated: their thoughts raised on the banner of pride, their minds caught up in the net of craving, their thoughts and minds caught up in the gloom of deceit and hypocrisy, their minds and thoughts full of jealousy and stinginess,

original: 'jungs pa can gyi kun nas 'khor bas lam gyi rgyud du skye ba'i kun tu 'brel ba dang / @88b 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la spyod pa'i las shin tu bsags pa dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pas 'bar ba byas pa'i sems kyi me lce dang /🔽phyin ci log dang bcas pa'i las mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'dod pa dang / srid pa'i ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / kun tu zag pa'i bag chags mtshams 'brel ba'i sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jungs pa can gyi kun nas 'khor bas lam gyi rgyud du skye ba'i kun tu 'brel ba dang / @88b 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la spyod pa'i las shin tu bsags pa dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pas 'bar ba byas pa'i sems kyi me lce dang / phyin ci log dang bcas pa'i las mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'dod pa dang / srid pa'i ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / kun tu zag pa'i bag chags mtshams 'brel ba'i sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis 'di lta ste /
translated: It is the accumulation of the karma of the conduct of desire, anger, and ignorance. It is the flame of the mind that is the fire of anger and resentment.

original: khams gsum du ming dang gzugs lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad par byung ba'i yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyi myu gu mngon par bskyed do //
analyzed: khams gsum du ming dang gzugs lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad par byung ba'i yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyi myu gu mngon par bskyed do //
translated: It is the accomplishment of karma that is mistaken. It is the mind, thought, and consciousness that are connected to the latent tendencies of desire, existence, ignorance, views, and complete defilement. It is the seed of the arising of the sprout of the suffering of birth, which is the simultaneous arising and nonseparation of name and form in the three realms.

original: ming dang gzugs de rnam par 'phel nas /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs de rnam par 'phel nas /
translated: “Name and form increase

original: skye mched drug gi tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the collection of the six sense sources arises.

original: skye mched rnams byung bas phan tshun reg pa dang / phrad cing 'dus pas tshor ba mngon par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: skye mched rnams byung bas phan tshun reg pa dang / phrad cing 'dus pas tshor ba mngon par 'byung ngo //
translated: The arising of the sense-spheres leads to their mutual contact, and the coming together and meeting of these leads to the arising of sensation.

original: tshor ba myong ba de nyid la yang dang yang mngon par dga' bas sred pa dang / nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: tshor ba myong ba de nyid la yang dang yang mngon par dga' bas sred pa dang / nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: Sensation is experienced again and again with intense delight, and this leads to craving and appropriation.

original: nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bas srid pa kun tu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bas srid pa kun tu 'byung ngo //
translated: Craving and appropriation increase, and this leads to the arising of existence.

original: srid pa kun tu byung bas skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: srid pa kun tu byung bas skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The arising of existence leads to birth, old age, death, grief, lamentation, suffering, unhappiness, and distress.

original: de ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi phung po bdag dang bdag gi med pa /🔽gsob / gsog /
analyzed: de ltar sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi phung po bdag dang bdag gi med pa / gsob / gsog /
translated: Thus, this mass of suffering of sentient beings is devoid of self and what belongs to self.🔽It is hollow, hollowed out,

original: stong pa / byed pa med pa /
analyzed: stong pa / byed pa med pa /
translated: empty, without agent,

original: sems med pa /
analyzed: sems med pa /
translated: and without experiencer.

original: rtsva @89a *// dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / sgang sgong dang / mig g-yor lta bu mngon par 'byung yang de ltar khong du mi chud do //
analyzed: rtsva @89a *// dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / sgang sgong dang / mig g-yor lta bu mngon par 'byung yang de ltar khong du mi chud do //
translated: They are like grass, trees, walls, clods of earth, or illusions.

original: ces de la byang chub sems dpas sems can de dag de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po dang 'bral mi myong ba mthong nas /
analyzed: ces de la byang chub sems dpas sems can de dag de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po dang 'bral mi myong ba mthong nas /
translated: But the bodhisattvas see that those beings do not get free from that mass of suffering.

original: de'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po rgyas pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po rgyas pa 'byung ste /
translated: Therefore, their great compassion grows.

original: sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis yongs su bskyab par bya ba dag go /🔽yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis yongs su bskyab par bya ba dag go / yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go /
translated: “These beings are to be saved by me.🔽They are to be freed by me.

original: shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya ba dag go snyam ste /
analyzed: shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya ba dag go snyam ste /
translated: They are to be brought to complete bliss by me.”

original: de'i phyir de'i byams pa chen po rgyas pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i byams pa chen po rgyas pa 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, their great love grows.

original: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang / byams pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje dang / byams pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva, abiding on the first bodhisattva stage, has the superior intention endowed with such compassion and love,

original: dngos po thams cad la phangs par sems pa'i sems yongs su spangs nas /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la phangs par sems pa'i sems yongs su spangs nas /
translated: he completely abandons the attitude of cherishing all things.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa dang / dad pa rlabs po che'i blos sbyin pa chen po la rab tu brtson par byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa dang / dad pa rlabs po che'i blos sbyin pa chen po la rab tu brtson par byed de /
translated: With a mind of great aspiration and faith in the wisdom of the Buddha, he strives at great generosity.

original: de 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
translated: He thinks as follows:

original: nor dang 'bru'i mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su gtang bar bya ba dag gam /
analyzed: nor dang 'bru'i mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su gtang bar bya ba dag gam /
translated: “I will give away my wealth, grain, treasuries, and storehouses,

original: gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / rin po che sh'i la dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su @89b gtang ba'am /
analyzed: gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / rin po che sh'i la dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su @89b gtang ba'am /
translated: my gold, jewels, pearls, beryl, conch shells, crystals, coral, silver, and refined gold, my precious ornaments and adornments,

original: rta dang / glang po dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang dang / bzhon pa yongs su gtang ba'am /
analyzed: rta dang / glang po dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang dang / bzhon pa yongs su gtang ba'am /
translated: horses, elephants, chariots, foot soldiers, and vehicles;

original: bran pho dang bran mo yongs su gtang ba'am /
analyzed: bran pho dang bran mo yongs su gtang ba'am /
translated: male and female servants;

original: grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas yongs su gtang ba'am /
analyzed: grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas yongs su gtang ba'am /
translated: villages, towns, countries, capitals, and royal cities;

original: bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gtsug lag khang yongs su gtang ba'am /
analyzed: bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gtsug lag khang yongs su gtang ba'am /
translated: pleasure groves, forests for austerities, and temples;

original: chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba'am /
analyzed: chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba'am /
translated: wives, sons, and daughters;

original: sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba'am /
analyzed: sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba'am /
translated: all things that are loved and pleasing;

original: mgo dang / rna ba dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / yan lag gi dam pa dang / lus thams cad yongs su gtang ba'am /
analyzed: mgo dang / rna ba dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / yan lag gi dam pa dang / lus thams cad yongs su gtang ba'am /
translated: heads, ears, hands, feet, eyes, the best of limbs, and the entire body;

original: gtang bar bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad la chags pa med par byas nas /
analyzed: gtang bar bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad la chags pa med par byas nas /
translated: and all things that are to be given away, without attachment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dad pa dang / mos pa'i blos yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dad pa dang / mos pa'i blos yongs su gtong ste /
translated: He gives them away with a mind of faith and devotion to the wisdom of the Buddhas.

original: de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: Thus, when he is on this first bodhisattva stage,

original: gtod pa chen po rab tu byed do //
analyzed: gtod pa chen po rab tu byed do //
translated: he is engaged in great giving.

original: de de ltar byams pa dang / snying rje dang / gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer to //
analyzed: de de ltar byams pa dang / snying rje dang / gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer to //
translated: With a mind of love, compassion, and generosity, he seeks and pursues the mundane and supramundane aims of all sentient beings in order to protect them.

original: de de ltar yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer ba'i tshe yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skye ste /
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su tshol zhing don du gnyer ba'i tshe yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skye ste /
translated: When he is seeking and pursuing in this way, he does not develop a weary mind.

original: de'i phyir de'i yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems mngon par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems mngon par 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, his mind of non-weariness arises.

original: @90a *// yongs su skyo ba med pas gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa yin /
analyzed: @90a *// yongs su skyo ba med pas gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa yin /
translated: Because he is not weary, he is fearless with regard to all the scriptures.

original: de'i phyir gtsug lag thams cad la rab tu shes pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gtsug lag thams cad la rab tu shes pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, he is well-versed in all the scriptures.

original: de de lta bu'i gtsug lag dang ldan pas bya ba dang / mi bya ba shin tu rtogs pa'i blos sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma la dad pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / ci 'os pas ci nus su snying thag pa nas yang dag pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do //
analyzed: de de lta bu'i gtsug lag dang ldan pas bya ba dang / mi bya ba shin tu rtogs pa'i blos sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma la dad pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / ci 'os pas ci nus su snying thag pa nas yang dag pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do //
translated: Endowed with such learning, with a mind that has thoroughly understood what should and should not be done, he or she strives with all his or her heart to cause sentient beings of the highest, middling, and lowest capacities to attain the state of complete purity, in whatever way is appropriate and to whatever extent is possible.

original: nan tan du byed do //
analyzed: nan tan du byed do //
translated: He or she practices with perseverance.

original: de'i phyir de 'jig rten shes pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de 'jig rten shes pa yin te /
translated: For these reasons, he or she is one who knows the world.

original: 'jig rten shes pas dus dang tshod du ran par spyod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas bsam pa shin tu brgyan pas /
analyzed: 'jig rten shes pas dus dang tshod du ran par spyod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas bsam pa shin tu brgyan pas /
translated: With knowledge of the world, he or she acts in a timely and appropriate manner and, with a mind that is well adorned with a sense of shame and a sense of integrity,

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don du rab tu brtson par byed de /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don du rab tu brtson par byed de /
translated: he or she strives to benefit both him or herself and others.

original: de'i phyir ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin /
translated: For these reasons, he or she is one who has a sense of shame and a sense of integrity.

original: sbyor ba de dag la'ang 'byung bar spyod pa yin /
analyzed: sbyor ba de dag la'ang 'byung bar spyod pa yin /
translated: He or she practices in relation to those very forms of practice.

original: phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stobs kyis shugs kyang rab tu thob pa yin te /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stobs kyis shugs kyang rab tu thob pa yin te /
translated: He has irreversible and unregressing effort and strength.

original: de ltar de dga' ba'i stobs dang shugs yongs su skyes pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar de dga' ba'i stobs dang shugs yongs su skyes pa yin /
translated: Thus, he has fully developed the power and strength of joy.

original: dga' ba'i stobs dang shugs rab tu thob pas /
analyzed: dga' ba'i stobs dang shugs rab tu thob pas /
translated: Having attained the power and strength of joy,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba la rab tu brtson zhing bstan pa la'ang nan tan shin tu byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba la rab tu brtson zhing bstan pa la'ang nan tan shin tu byed do //
translated: he is dedicated to making offerings to and serving the Tathāgatas and is also dedicated to the teachings.

original: de ltar de'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ltar de'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di lta ste /
translated: Thus, these are the dharmas that purify his stage:

original: dad pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pa dang / gtong ba dang / skyo ba med pa dang / gtsug lag shes pa @90b dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang / khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / dga' ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
analyzed: dad pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pa dang / gtong ba dang / skyo ba med pa dang / gtsug lag shes pa @90b dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang / khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / dga' ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
translated: faith, compassion, love, generosity, indefatigability, knowledge of the scriptures, knowledge of the world, shame, embarrassment, the power and strength of joy,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i nan tan yongs su skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i nan tan yongs su skyes pa yin no //
translated: and the dedication to making offerings to and serving the Tathāgatas.

original: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: When he is on this Bodhisattva stage called “The Joyful One”,

original: lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur te /🔽lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /
analyzed: lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur te / lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /
translated: he sees many Buddhas through the power of his vast view and his prayers.🔽He sees many hundreds of Buddhas, many thousands of Buddhas, many hundreds of thousands of Buddhas, many millions of Buddhas,🔽many tens of millions of Buddhas, many billions of Buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: many tens of billions of Buddhas, many trillions of Buddhas, many tens of trillions of Buddhas, many hundreds of trillions of Buddhas, many thousands of trillions of Buddhas, many hundreds of thousands of trillions of Buddhas.

original: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas /
analyzed: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas /
translated: Having seen those tathāgatas, those saints, those genuinely fully awake buddhas,

original: bsams pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do //🔽bkur sti byed do //
analyzed: bsams pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do // bkur sti byed do //
translated: he serves them with vast thoughts.🔽He honors them.

original: bsti stang byed do //
analyzed: bsti stang byed do //
translated: He respects them.

original: mchod pa byed do //
analyzed: mchod pa byed do //
translated: He makes offerings to them.

original: na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing /
analyzed: na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing /
translated: He offers them robes, alms-food, bedding and seats, and medicines for sickness.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo /
translated: He offers them all the necessities of life for a bodhisattva.

original: dge @91a *// 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod par byed de /
analyzed: dge @91a *// 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod par byed de /
translated: He makes offerings to the assemblies of monks.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: de ltar des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mchod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mngon par 'grub pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mchod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mngon par 'grub pa yin /
translated: In this way, by making offerings to those lord buddhas, he accomplishes the full ripening of sentient beings.

original: de bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa gnyis kyi shas che bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: de bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa gnyis kyi shas che bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: He brings beings to maturity by the power of his generosity and agreeable speech, which are the two means of gathering disciples.

original: de'i mos pa'i shugs dang / stobs kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po gong ma gnyis kyang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i mos pa'i shugs dang / stobs kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po gong ma gnyis kyang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: By the force and power of his faith, he accomplishes the two higher means of gathering disciples.

original: ma lus par khong du chud par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma lus par khong du chud par ni ma yin no //
translated: But he does not fully understand them.

original: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
translated: Among the ten perfections, the perfection of generosity predominates,

original: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: but he also practices the other perfections, to the best of his ability and according to his means.

original: de ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing /
analyzed: de ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing /
translated: As he makes offerings to the Blessed Buddhas,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa dang / sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pa /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa dang / sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pa /
translated: to the extent that they take up and maintain these teachings for purifying the bodhisattva stages, to that extent all their roots of virtue, dedicated to omniscience,

original: de dag de bas kyang shas cher shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag de bas kyang shas cher shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will become even more refined, purified, and workable.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / mgar ba mkhas pas @91b gser gyi sa le sbram ji lta ji ltar mer bsregs pa de lta de ltar shin tu byang zhing yongs su dag pa dang / ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na / mgar ba mkhas pas @91b gser gyi sa le sbram ji lta ji ltar mer bsregs pa de lta de ltar shin tu byang zhing yongs su dag pa dang / ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: just as a skilled smith can refine gold in the fire as much as he wants, so that it becomes very refined, purified, and workable,

original: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing /
translated: in the same way, the more bodhisattvas make offerings to the blessed buddhas,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson par byed pa dang / sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de dag shin tu byang ba dang /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson par byed pa dang / sa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta de ltar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de dag shin tu byang ba dang /
translated: In this way, all his roots of virtue dedicated to omniscience will be purified,

original: yongs su dag pa dang / ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa dang / ci dgar las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and he will be able to use them as he wishes.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: gzhan yang sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: gzhan yang sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: the bodhisattva who is on the first bodhisattva stage

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nyid kyi rnam pa dang / 'thob par bya ba dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nyid kyi rnam pa dang / 'thob par bya ba dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o //
translated: should seek and inquire about the aspects, attainment, and causally concordant effects of the first bodhisattva stage from the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and spiritual friends.

original: sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms mi shes par byas te /
analyzed: sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms mi shes par byas te /
translated: He should also be insatiable in accomplishing the branches of the stages.

original: des byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: des byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: When he is on this first bodhisattva stage,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / @92a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / @92a *//
translated: he should seek and inquire about the second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh,

original: brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa'i rnam pa dang / 'thob bar bya ba dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang / bcu pa'i rnam pa dang / 'thob bar bya ba dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las yongs su btsal zhing yongs su dri bar bya'o //
translated: eighth, ninth, and tenth bodhisattva stages from the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and spiritual teachers, about their aspects, their attainments, and their results that accord with the causes.

original: sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms mi shes par bya'o //🔽des sa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir yang ngoms mi shes par bya'o // des sa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: He should also be insatiable in accomplishing the branches of the stages.

original: sa 'grub pa dang / 'jig pa la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa 'grub pa dang / 'jig pa la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: He should be skilled in the side of the stages that is favorable and in the side that is not favorable.🔽He should be skilled in the accomplishment and destruction of the stages.

original: sa'i rnam pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i rnam pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: the aspects of the stages, and the result that accords with the cause.

original: sa 'thob par bya ba dang / rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa 'thob par bya ba dang / rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: One should be skilled in attaining the stages and in cultivating them.

original: sa'i rnam pa yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas par bya'o //🔽sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas par bya'o //🔽sa dang sa la rnam par gnas pa la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i rnam pa yongs su sbyang ba la mkhas par bya'o // sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas par bya'o // sa dang sa la rnam par gnas pa la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: One should be skilled in purifying the aspects of the stages.🔽One should be skilled in advancing from stage to stage.🔽One should be skilled in abiding in the stages.

original: sa nas sa'i gnas gzhan du 'pho bar bya ba la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa nas sa'i gnas gzhan du 'pho bar bya ba la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: One should be skilled in transferring from stage to stage.

original: sa nas sar yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par gyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa nas sar yongs su sbyang ba'i khyad par gyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: One should be skilled in the knowledge of the distinctions of purification from stage to stage.

original: sa nas sa thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: sa nas sa thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: One should be skilled in the knowledge of irreversibility from stage to stage.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyang bas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyang bas /
translated: One should be skilled in the knowledge of the purification of the bodhisattva stages.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa gnan pa la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa gnan pa la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: One should be skilled in the knowledge of the attainment of the stage of the Tathāgata.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa @92b ni sa dang po las gyen du ma bskyod par sa bcu'i bar du gnan cing 'thab par bya ba thogs pa med de /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa @92b ni sa dang po las gyen du ma bskyod par sa bcu'i bar du gnan cing 'thab par bya ba thogs pa med de /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva great beings who are skilled in accomplishing the aspects of the bhūmis, without being moved from the first bhūmi, are able to go up to the tenth bhūmi without impediment.

original: thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / sa'i ye shes snang bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu thob bo //
analyzed: thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / sa'i ye shes snang bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu thob bo //
translated: They attain the illumination of the wisdom of the bhūmis and also the illumination of the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious One!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / ded dpon chen po mkhas pas lam grogs yongs su gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dper na / ded dpon chen po mkhas pas lam grogs yongs su gdon pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa /
translated: For example, a great captain who is skilled and has the intention to protect his companions

original: grong rdal chen po'i sar phyin par bya bar 'dod pa ni thog ma nas lam dang lam gyi yon tan dang / lam las gol ba'i nyes pa dang / lam gyi bar lam gyi khyad par dang / lam gyi bar lam 'khrul na nyes par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: grong rdal chen po'i sar phyin par bya bar 'dod pa ni thog ma nas lam dang lam gyi yon tan dang / lam las gol ba'i nyes pa dang / lam gyi bar lam gyi khyad par dang / lam gyi bar lam 'khrul na nyes par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and who wishes to reach the level of a great city will from the beginning know the path, the qualities of the path, the faults of straying from the path, the distinctions of the intermediate stages of the path, and the faults of mistaking the intermediate stages of the path.

original: lam du bya mi bya dang / brgyags bshams pa yongs su tshol zhing kun tu 'dri'o //

analyzed: mkha' 'dra shin tu yangs pa'i sems dang ldan par byed //

analyzed: chags med mngon gyur gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa //

original: bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam gyur sems kyi dam pa bskyed //
analyzed: bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam gyur sems kyi dam pa bskyed //

analyzed: bde gshegs sras sems rin chen yang dag skyes 'phral du //

analyzed: byis pa'i spyod bral sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod dang ldan //

original: stobs bcu mnga' rigs kha na ma tho med par skyes //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' rigs kha na ma tho med par skyes //

analyzed: bde gshegs mnyam nyid rjes rtogs byang chub mchog tu nges //

original: 'di 'dra'i sems dang sa thob lhan cig mngon par skyes //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i sems dang sa thob lhan cig mngon par skyes //

original: bsam pa mi g-yo ri yi rgyal po 'dra bar gnas //
analyzed: bsam pa mi g-yo ri yi rgyal po 'dra bar gnas //
translated: Their intention is unshakable, like the king of mountains.

original: rab tu dga' zhing spro mang dad dang ldan pa ste //
analyzed: rab tu dga' zhing spro mang dad dang ldan pa ste //

original: mos pa'i shugs yangs rtag par sems kyi mchog dang ldan //
analyzed: mos pa'i shugs yangs rtag par sems kyi mchog dang ldan //

original: 'khrug dang 'tshe ba med cing khro ba med pa ste //
analyzed: 'khrug dang 'tshe ba med cing khro ba med pa ste //

original: ngo tsha shes shing srid zhu drang ldan shin tu @96a *//
analyzed: ngo tsha shes shing srid zhu drang ldan shin tu @96a *//
translated: They have a sense of shame, are respectful, honest, and very restrained.

original: bsdams // 'gro ba yongs su bskyab pa'i mtshungs med ye shes dran gyur cing //
analyzed: bsdams // 'gro ba yongs su bskyab pa'i mtshungs med ye shes dran gyur cing //

analyzed: 'dod par bya ba'i gnas dang ldan gyur dga' ba bskyed //
translated: And they are in a state of desire, which gives rise to joy.

analyzed: sa thob gyur ma thag tu 'jigs pa lnga dang bral //

analyzed: 'tsho ba med dang 'chi dang mi bsngags ngan 'gro dang // 'khor gyi 'jigs bral de la bag tsha'i rnam pa med //

analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na de la bdag gi gnas med do //

original: de dag bag chags bral zhing snying rje byams dang ldan //
analyzed: de dag bag chags bral zhing snying rje byams dang ldan //

original: bsti stang dang ldan dga' ba phun sum yon tan mang //
analyzed: bsti stang dang ldan dga' ba phun sum yon tan mang //
translated: They are respectful, full of joy, and have many good qualities.

original: nyin dang mtshan du dge ba'i phyogs la sten byed cing //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du dge ba'i phyogs la sten byed cing //

analyzed: dge ba'i chos thos bsam la mkhas shing gnas med spyod //
translated: They are skilled in listening to and reflecting on the teachings of virtue, and they practice without a fixed abode.

original: thob sems sred bral byang chub sems la rtag par dga'//
analyzed: thob sems sred bral byang chub sems la rtag par dga'//
translated: Free from the craving for attainment, they always delight in bodhicitta.

original: bde gshegs ye shes 'dod cing gzhan du sems pa med //
analyzed: bde gshegs ye shes 'dod cing gzhan du sems pa med //

analyzed: ci smras de bzhin byed pas bden pa'i tshig la gnas //

analyzed: 'jig rten las kyi bsam bral 'gro ba'i don du brtson //
translated: Free from worldly thoughts, they strive for the sake of beings.

analyzed: dkar pos ngoms pa med par phyir zhing gong du rtsol //

analyzed: de dag 'di 'dra'i chos brtson yon tan don dang ldan //

analyzed: rgyal ba blta ba'i don du smon lam @96b mngon par sgrub //

analyzed: dam chos yongs su gzung zhing drang srong drung 'gro dang // spyod pa mchog gi don du smon lam mngon par sgrub //

original: sems can yongs su smin bya sangs rgyas zhing sbyangs te //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin bya sangs rgyas zhing sbyangs te //

original: de yi zhing mchog rgyal sras kun gyis gang 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de yi zhing mchog rgyal sras kun gyis gang 'gyur zhing //

analyzed: rgyal sras rnams dang bsam pa gcig cing don mthun phyir //

analyzed: skra sbubs kun tu don gyi dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya //

original: de dag smon lam du ma mngon par sgrub pa byed //
analyzed: de dag smon lam du ma mngon par sgrub pa byed //

original: de dag mtha' yas yangs shing mthar thug med dang ldan //
analyzed: de dag mtha' yas yangs shing mthar thug med dang ldan //

analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dang chos nyid mya ngan 'das khams dang // 'jig rten mthar thug rgyal ba 'byung dang ye shes sa //

analyzed: sems kyi yul dang ye shes 'jug pa'i mthar thug dang // rnam gsum rgyud rnams mthar thug 'gro ba'i mur thug pa //

analyzed: rnam pa de tshul bdag smon mthar yang thug gyur cing //

analyzed: de dag mthar thug ji bzhin bdag spyod de 'drar shog /

analyzed: de ltar mngon bsgrubs 'jam zhing byams pa'i sems ldan pa //
translated: Having accomplished that, with a gentle and loving mind,

analyzed: sangs rgyas yon tan yid ches sems can rnam par lta //

analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal nyon mongs bdag gis bskyab ces te //

analyzed: rten 'brel 'byung 'jug snying rje byams dang ldan pa ni //
translated: With compassion and love, the arising and engaging of dependent origination,

analyzed: de dag don du sna tshogs sbyin pa yang du rtsom //

analyzed: rgyal srid mchog dang rin chen sna tshogs glang po rta //

analyzed: mgo dang @97a *//

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /

analyzed: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byed pa dang / sems can stong yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
translated: understand their blessings, shake a thousand worlds, go to a thousand Buddha-fields, illuminate a thousand worlds, mature a thousand beings,

translated: They strive with such perseverance that they can remain for a thousand eons, enter a thousand eons of the past and the future, open a thousand Dharma doors, manifest a thousand bodies, and manifest a retinue of a thousand bodhisattvas for each body.

original: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
analyzed: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
translated: “Beyond that, bodhisattvas who have the power of aspiration manifest through the specific power of their aspirations.

original: de dag gi lus sam /
analyzed: de dag gi lus sam /
translated: Their bodies,🔽their light,

original: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
analyzed: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
translated: their miracles,🔽their eyes,

original: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
analyzed: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
translated: their range,🔽their voices,

original: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
analyzed: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
translated: their conduct,

original: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
analyzed: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
translated: their ornaments,🔽and their blessings are beyond measure.

original: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
analyzed: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to count them even for many eons, for many hundreds of eons, many thousands of eons, many hundreds of thousands of eons, many millions of eons, many tens of millions of eons, many billions of eons, many tens of billions of eons, many trillions of eons, and many quintillions of eons.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //

original: de dag gnyen drang las rung 'jam pa'i sems ldan zhing /
analyzed: de dag gnyen drang las rung 'jam pa'i sems ldan zhing /
translated: “They have a mind that is gentle, fit for relatives,

original: bsam pa dag dang bsam pa zhi dang ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: bsam pa dag dang bsam pa zhi dang ldan pa rnams //
translated: With pure intention and peaceful intention.

original: 'du 'dzi'i dmigs bral rlabs chen blo dang ldan pa yin //
analyzed: 'du 'dzi'i dmigs bral rlabs chen blo dang ldan pa yin //

original: che nyid sems ldan mkhas pa de dag gnyis la 'phar //
analyzed: che nyid sems ldan mkhas pa de dag gnyis la 'phar //
translated: Those wise ones, with great minds, are intent on the two.

original: de gnas yon tan 'chang zhing dge ba phun ldan pa //
analyzed: de gnas yon tan 'chang zhing dge ba phun ldan pa //
translated: They abide in virtue and possess the qualities.

original: gtse med sems ldan srog gcod rnam par kun spangs shing //
analyzed: gtse med sems ldan srog gcod rnam par kun spangs shing //

original: ma byin len dang gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin spangs //
analyzed: ma byin len dang gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin spangs //

original: bden dang ldan zhing phra ma mi smra zhe gcod med //
analyzed: bden dang ldan zhing phra ma mi smra zhe gcod med //

analyzed: gzhan @108a *// gyi longs spyod 'dod sems bral zhing byams sems ldan //

original: drang zhing g-yo med yang dag lam du rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: drang zhing g-yo med yang dag lam du rab tu zhugs //

original: g-yo med thibs po med cing shin tu nges pa ste //
analyzed: g-yo med thibs po med cing shin tu nges pa ste //

original: rtag tu bag yod ston pa'i spyod pa yongs su srung //
analyzed: rtag tu bag yod ston pa'i spyod pa yongs su srung //
translated: They are always heedful and protect the conduct of the Teacher.🔽Whatever sufferings there are in the hells and animal realms,

analyzed: sems dmyal byol song skye gnas sdug bsngal ji snyed dang // gshin rje'i ris na yi dvags rtag tu lus 'bar ba //

original: de dag sdig blos dge ba min la brtson pas byung //
analyzed: de dag sdig blos dge ba min la brtson pas byung //
translated: arise from the sinful mind that strives for what is unwholesome.

original: de bas de spangs bden pa'i chos dang ldan par bya //
analyzed: de bas de spangs bden pa'i chos dang ldan par bya //
translated: Therefore, having abandoned that, one should be endowed with the true Dharma.

original: mi yi nang du skye ba yid du 'ong la sogs //
analyzed: mi yi nang du skye ba yid du 'ong la sogs //
translated: Among humans, birth in pleasant realms and so forth

original: srid rtse'i bar gyi lha yi bsam gtan bde ba dang // rang rgyal theg pa de bzhin nyan thos theg pa dag /
analyzed: srid rtse'i bar gyi lha yi bsam gtan bde ba dang // rang rgyal theg pa de bzhin nyan thos theg pa dag /

original: kun kyang dkar lam bcu pos byung ba yin zhes te //
analyzed: kun kyang dkar lam bcu pos byung ba yin zhes te //
translated: All of these arise from the ten white paths.

original: de ltar shes shing rtag par mkhas pa bag yod pa //
analyzed: de ltar shes shing rtag par mkhas pa bag yod pa //

analyzed: shin tu bsdams pa'i yid kyis pha rol tshul la 'god //
translated: With a well-restrained mind, they establish others in the way.

analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal shes shing snying brtse bskyed byas nas //
translated: Knowing the suffering of sentient beings, they generate compassion,

original: de bas gong du snying rje'i sems dang ldan par byed //
analyzed: de bas gong du snying rje'i sems dang ldan par byed //
translated: And from that, they possess a compassionate mind.

original: kye ma byis pa'i blo can 'di dag lta ngan lhung //
analyzed: kye ma byis pa'i blo can 'di dag lta ngan lhung //

original: khro zhing shar gnyer gnod pa kun sems rtsod pa can //
analyzed: khro zhing shar gnyer gnod pa kun sems rtsod pa can //
translated: Angry, frowning, with a mind full of harm, quarrelsome,

original: rtag tu mi ngoms yul la yang dang yang du smon //
analyzed: rtag tu mi ngoms yul la yang dang yang du smon //
translated: Always insatiable, they repeatedly wish for objects.

original: gzhi gsum 'brel ba de dag yongs su dgrol bar bya //
analyzed: gzhi gsum 'brel ba de dag yongs su dgrol bar bya //
translated: Those three bases and their connections are to be liberated.

original: gti mug mun pa chen pos kun nas yog pa rnams //
analyzed: gti mug mun pa chen pos kun nas yog pa rnams //

original: lta ba'i dra mang mya ngam lam du lhung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: lta ba'i dra mang mya ngam lam du lhung 'gyur ba //

analyzed: @108b 'khor ba'i shing thags nang na rtag tu dgras gtse zhing //

analyzed: bdud kyi chom po'i nang gnas de dag bdag gis dgrol //
translated: And are in the midst of the thieves of the māras. I will liberate them.

analyzed: nyon mongs rlabs kyis g-yengs shing chu bo bzhir nub pa //
translated: “They are tossed about by the waves of the kleśas and are drowning in the four rivers.

analyzed: khams gsum sdug bsngal brgya yis yongs su gdungs pa rnams //
translated: They are tormented by the hundreds of sufferings of the three realms.

analyzed: phung po'i gnas la rten cing bdag tu 'du shes pa //
translated: They are attached to the abodes of the skandhas and have the notion of a self.🔽I will strive to liberate them from suffering.

analyzed: de dag sdug bsngal dgrol don bdag gis brtson par bya; ;sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa rmad byung phul spangs shing //

analyzed: 'byung ba yod bzhin dma' ba'i blo gros skyed byed pa //
translated: And have developed a lowly understanding while the buddhas are present.

analyzed: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dgod ces; ;rgyal ba'i ye shes don du brtson 'grus yangs pa rtsom //
translated: I will establish them in the wisdom of the tathāgatas. I will generate vast diligence for the sake of the wisdom of the jinas.

original: 'di gnas yon tan brgya bsags drang srong chen po rnams //
analyzed: 'di gnas yon tan brgya bsags drang srong chen po rnams //

analyzed: bde gshegs du ma mthong zhing mchod pa'ang rab tu byed //

analyzed: dge ba de dag bskal pa bye bar phyir zhing sbyong //

original: gser gyi dam pa nag mtshur nang du bcug pa bzhin //

analyzed: 'di gnas rgyal sras 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur //

analyzed: dge ba bcu la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed //

original: dge tshogs gang yang rung ste gsog par byed pa rnams //
analyzed: dge tshogs gang yang rung ste gsog par byed pa rnams //

analyzed: 'dod na rgyal po'i srid kyang rnam par spangs byas shing //

analyzed: brtan pa rnams ni bstan pa'i mchog la rab byung nas //

analyzed: brtson 'grus ldan zhing ting 'dzin dam pa mchog kyang 'thob //
translated: They will become diligent and attain the supreme, excellent meditative absorption,

analyzed: sangs @109a *// rgyas stong tshang skad cig gcig gis mthong bar byed //

analyzed: khyu mchog sa 'di gnas pa rab tu ston par byed //

analyzed: de yi gong nas ye shes smon lam mchog ldan pa //
translated: Above that, with the supreme aspiration of wisdom,

analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa du mas sems can 'dul //

analyzed: de ltar sa mchog gnyis pa 'di // 'jig rten kun la phan 'dod pa'i // byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la //

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyis bstan //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyis bstan //

original: dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'o //// bam po bzhi bcu bdun pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam yas pa //

analyzed: sa mchog spyod pa de skad thos gyur nas //

analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras rnams rab tu dga' zhing bsti stang du //

analyzed: me tog sprin char kun nas mngon par 'bebs //

original: ri yi rgyal por bod pa legs so legs //
analyzed: ri yi rgyal por bod pa legs so legs //

analyzed: sems can kun la snying brtse bsam pa yis //

analyzed: sa mchog dam pa'i spyod yul de 'dra dang // mkhas pa'i tshul khrims sdom pa khyod kyis bshad //

analyzed: yang dag de dngos ma nor gzhan min pa'i; ;byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid 'ong zhing // sems can kun la phan dang bde bar rab sems pa //
translated: Is the true, unmistaken, and unerring path.🔽You have taught the supreme illumination

original: phul du 'od gsal khyod kyis bstan pa byas //
analyzed: phul du 'od gsal khyod kyis bstan pa byas //
translated: That is the perfect thought of benefit and happiness for all beings.

original: da dung @109b da chud lha dang mis mchod cing //
analyzed: da dung @109b da chud lha dang mis mchod cing //

analyzed: sa yi dam pa gsum pa brjod par mdzod //

analyzed: drang srong chen po'i sbyin tshul spyod pa dang // bzod pa brtson 'grus zhi ba shes rab thabs //

analyzed: byams pa'i mchog dang snying rje lam gyi rnams //
translated: The supreme love and the path of compassion,🔽Please teach the training in the conduct of the bodhisattvas.

analyzed: rgyal sras spyod pa rnam sbyang bstan mdzod cig ;rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la //

analyzed: rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa //
translated: Vimukticandra then said:🔽“The wise one should explain

analyzed: gsum la yang dag 'phar 'gyur ba'i //

original: bsam pa mkhas pas bshad pa mdzod //
analyzed: bsam pa mkhas pas bshad pa mdzod //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /

analyzed: kye / rgyal ba'i sras dag /

analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa ni /

original: sa gsum pa yongs su gnon to //
analyzed: sa gsum pa yongs su gnon to //
translated: will ascend to the third bhūmi.

analyzed: de sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba bcus yongs su gnon to //

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

analyzed: dag pa'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang / mi g-yo ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang / skyo ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang /
translated: the mental attitude of a pure mind, the mental attitude of an unwavering mind, the mental attitude of a weary mind, the mental attitude of a mind free from desire,

translated: the attitude of the irreversible mind, the attitude of the firm mind, the attitude of the purified mind, the attitude of the conceited mind,

analyzed: che'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba dang / bdag nyid che ba'i sems kyi bsam pa yid la bya ba'o //
