analyzed: thu bor 'gyur / phul du 'gyur /
translated: May I become the best!🔽May I become the most excellent!

original: dam par 'gyur /
analyzed: dam par 'gyur /
translated: May I become the highest!

original: bla na med par 'gyur /
analyzed: bla na med par 'gyur /
translated: May I become the unequaled!

original: 'dren par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dren par 'gyur /
translated: May I become the leader!🔽May I become the guide!

original: yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
analyzed: yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
translated: May I become the one who supports the wisdom of omniscience!’

original: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
translated: They are never separate from keeping in mind the Buddha, keeping in mind the Dharma, keeping in mind the Saṅgha, keeping in mind the bodhisattvas, keeping in mind the bodhisattva activities, keeping in mind the bodhisattva levels,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
translated: keeping in mind the perfections, keeping in mind the powers, keeping in mind the fearlessnesses, keeping in mind the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
translated: up to keeping in mind omniscient wisdom endowed with all supreme aspects.

original: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mthong zhing de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig spyod pa dang /
analyzed: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mthong zhing de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig spyod pa dang /
translated: see quintillions of buddhas and understand their blessings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig tu 'gro ba dang / 'jig @130a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig tu 'gro ba dang / 'jig @130a *//
translated: travel to quintillions of buddhafields,🔽illuminate quintillions of world systems,🔽bring quintillions of sentient beings to full maturity,🔽remain for quintillions of eons,

original: rten gyi khams khrag khrig snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig tu gnas par bya ba dang; sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: rten gyi khams khrag khrig snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig tu gnas par bya ba dang; sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
translated: and engage with quintillions of eons in the past and the future.

original: chos kyi sgo khrag khrig rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus khrag khrig yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
analyzed: chos kyi sgo khrag khrig rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus khrag khrig yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
translated: They strive with such an aspect of diligence that they open up a quintillion Dharma doors, they manifest a quintillion bodies, and they manifest a retinue of a quintillion bodhisattvas for each body.

original: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
analyzed: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
translated: “Beyond that, bodhisattvas who have the power of prayer manifest through the particularities of their prayers.

original: de dag gi lus sam /
analyzed: de dag gi lus sam /
translated: Their bodies,🔽their light,

original: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
analyzed: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
translated: their miracles,🔽their eyes,🔽their range,

original: mig gam / spyod yul lam; dbyangs sam /
analyzed: mig gam / spyod yul lam; dbyangs sam /
translated: their speech,🔽their conduct,

original: spyod pa'am / rgyan tam /
analyzed: spyod pa'am / rgyan tam /
translated: their adornments,

original: byin gyi rlabs sam /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs sam /
translated: and their blessings🔽are beyond number.

original: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
analyzed: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to count them even for many eons, many hundreds of eons, many thousands of eons, many hundreds of thousands of eons, many millions of eons, many tens of millions of eons, many billions of eons, many tens of billions of eons, many trillions of eons, or even many quintillions of eons.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajra garbha, in order to analyze and teach the meaning of this bhūmi, recited these verses:

original: sa gsum 'od byed pa @130b la shin tu sbyangs byas shing //
analyzed: sa gsum 'od byed pa @130b la shin tu sbyangs byas shing //
translated: “Having thoroughly purified the third bhūmi, Luminous,🔽The bodhisattva, in order to attain the fourth bhūmi,🔽Examines the realm of space, the realm of phenomena, the realm of sentient beings,

original: nam mkha'i khams dang yid kyi khams dang khams gsum dang // sems can spyod dang chos dang 'jig rten dpyod byed cing //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dang yid kyi khams dang khams gsum dang // sems can spyod dang chos dang 'jig rten dpyod byed cing //
translated: And the realms of conduct, phenomena, and worlds.🔽“He examines the realms of faith and intention,

original: mos dang bsam pa rnam par dag pa yang dag gnon //
analyzed: mos dang bsam pa rnam par dag pa yang dag gnon //
translated: And the realms of purity and non-purity.

original: 'od 'phro yod pa'i sa thob 'phral du mthu chen rnams //
analyzed: 'od 'phro yod pa'i sa thob 'phral du mthu chen rnams //
translated: As soon as they attain the stage of Radiant Light, they become great magicians.

original: ston pa'i rigs su yang dag skyes pas phyir mi ldog /
analyzed: ston pa'i rigs su yang dag skyes pas phyir mi ldog /
translated: They are born in the family of the Teacher and are irreversible.

original: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dad mi phyed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dad mi phyed //
translated: They have unshakable faith in the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha.

original: skye zhing 'jig dang gnas ma byed pa med par lta //
analyzed: skye zhing 'jig dang gnas ma byed pa med par lta //
translated: They see that there is no creation, destruction, or abiding.🔽They contemplate the world, its actions, its agents, its births in existence,

original: 'jig rten rgyu ba'i las dang byed dang srid skye dang // mya ngan 'das 'khor zhing dang sems can rnam par sgom //
analyzed: 'jig rten rgyu ba'i las dang byed dang srid skye dang // mya ngan 'das 'khor zhing dang sems can rnam par sgom //
translated: Its saṃsāra, its realms, and its beings.🔽They contemplate the past and future, the non-exhaustion and non-birth,

original: sngon dang phyi mtha' zad dang skye med grub pa dang // las la ston pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'brang zhing sgom //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi mtha' zad dang skye med grub pa dang // las la ston pa'i rigs kyi rjes su 'brang zhing sgom //
translated: And the actions of the Teacher, following the family of the Teacher.

original: de dag 'di 'dra'i chos ldan phan dang bder sems pa //
analyzed: de dag 'di 'dra'i chos ldan phan dang bder sems pa //
translated: Those who possess such qualities, who wish for benefit and happiness,

original: lus dang dran pa tshor ba sems dang chos sgom ste //
analyzed: lus dang dran pa tshor ba sems dang chos sgom ste //
translated: Contemplate the body, mindfulness, feelings, mind, and phenomena.

original: dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa rten pa rnams spangs pa //
analyzed: dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa rten pa rnams spangs pa //
translated: They cultivate the foundations of mindfulness, abandoning attachment.

original: phyi dang nang gi gnyis ka'i rnam par mkhas pa sgom sdig to zad cing dge chos rnam par 'phel 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi gnyis ka'i rnam par mkhas pa sgom sdig to zad cing dge chos rnam par 'phel 'gyur ba'i //
translated: The wise one who meditates on the outer, inner, and both,🔽will exhaust evil and increase virtuous dharmas.🔽

original: yang dag spong ba bzhi la'ang mkhas pa sgom par byed //
analyzed: yang dag spong ba bzhi la'ang mkhas pa sgom par byed //
translated: They cultivate the four right efforts, which are skilled in the outer and inner, which exhaust evil and increase good qualities.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi dang stobs dang dbang po dang / byang chub yan lag rin chen lam rab yid 'ong sgom //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi dang stobs dang dbang po dang / byang chub yan lag rin chen lam rab yid 'ong sgom //
translated: They cultivate the four bases of supernatural powers, the powers, the faculties, the branches of enlightenment, and the delightful path of the jewels.

original: de dag kun kyang 'gro la lta ba'i blo sgom ste //
analyzed: de dag kun kyang 'gro la lta ba'i blo sgom ste //
translated: They cultivate the mind that looks upon beings,

original: snying brtse byams pa sngon 'gro smon lam nye bar rton //🔽stobs kyi dam @131a *//
analyzed: snying brtse byams pa sngon 'gro smon lam nye bar rton // stobs kyi dam @131a *//
translated: and they cultivate love and compassion, with a prior aspiration and reliance.

original: pa go 'phang mchog gi rjes sems shing //
analyzed: pa go 'phang mchog gi rjes sems shing //
translated: They cultivate the supreme stage of the powers,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas zhing la smon //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas zhing la smon //
translated: and they aspire to the wisdom of omniscience and the buddhafields.🔽They aspire to the fearlessness of the teachers, to the indestructibility of the Dharma,

original: ston pa'i 'jigs med rnams dang chos rnams 'phrogs med dang // sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog la brten pa smon byed cing //
analyzed: ston pa'i 'jigs med rnams dang chos rnams 'phrogs med dang // sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog la brten pa smon byed cing //
translated: and to the supreme speech of the buddhas.

original: rin chen lam zab rnam par thar pa'i gnas rnams dang // che ba'i thabs rnams yang dag bsgrub phyir sgom par byed //
analyzed: rin chen lam zab rnam par thar pa'i gnas rnams dang // che ba'i thabs rnams yang dag bsgrub phyir sgom par byed //
translated: And the means of accomplishing greatness.

original: 'jig tshogs lta med lta ba drug cu gnyis kyang med //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs lta med lta ba drug cu gnyis kyang med //
translated: Without the view of the transitory collection, the sixty-two views do not exist.

original: bdag dang bdag gi med cing srog tu dmigs pa med /🔽phung po skye mched rnams dang khams kyi gnas dang rten //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi med cing srog tu dmigs pa med / phung po skye mched rnams dang khams kyi gnas dang rten //
translated: There is no self or “mine,” and no reference point of a life force.🔽The wise ones on the fourth ground completely abandon

original: kun kyang mkhas pas bzhi pa'i sa la rab tu spangs //
analyzed: kun kyang mkhas pas bzhi pa'i sa la rab tu spangs //
translated: The aggregates, sense bases, and elements, along with their bases and supports.

original: des ni gang dang gang rnams rgyal bas smad mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: des ni gang dang gang rnams rgyal bas smad mdzad pa'i //
translated: Whatever the Victorious Ones have condemned

original: las dang nyon mongs bcas pa don du mi 'gyur rnams //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs bcas pa don du mi 'gyur rnams //
translated: As unbeneficial, along with actions and afflictions,

original: de dag yongs su spangs shing mkhas pa khong nas dag /
analyzed: de dag yongs su spangs shing mkhas pa khong nas dag /
translated: The wise ones completely abandon them and become pure within.

original: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i don du las rab dge ba brtson //
analyzed: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i don du las rab dge ba brtson //
translated: They strive in virtuous actions for the sake of protecting beings.

original: mkhas pa de ni byams pa'i sems ldan bag kyang yod //
analyzed: mkhas pa de ni byams pa'i sems ldan bag kyang yod //
translated: The wise ones have a loving mind and are also conscientious.

original: gnyen 'jam sems ldan phan dang bde byed dran dang ldan //
analyzed: gnyen 'jam sems ldan phan dang bde byed dran dang ldan //
translated: They have a gentle mind, and are mindful of benefiting and bringing happiness.

original: dam pa'i don rnams thams cad skyon med yongs su tshol //
analyzed: dam pa'i don rnams thams cad skyon med yongs su tshol //
translated: They seek out all the aspects of the ultimate truth.

original: ye shes dbang bskur mngon mos 'gro ba'i don kyang byed //
analyzed: ye shes dbang bskur mngon mos 'gro ba'i don kyang byed //
translated: They are consecrated with the wisdom of the buddhas and work for the benefit of beings.

original: bla ma rim gror byed dang ldan zhing nan tan brtson //
analyzed: bla ma rim gror byed dang ldan zhing nan tan brtson //
translated: They are devoted to serving the guru and are diligent.

original: drin bzo khro ba med cing nga lo bde dang ldan //🔽@131b sgyu med thibs po med cing shin tu nges pa ste //
analyzed: drin bzo khro ba med cing nga lo bde dang ldan // @131b sgyu med thibs po med cing shin tu nges pa ste //
translated: They are grateful, not angry, and are happy.🔽They are not deceitful, not hypocritical, and are very certain.

original: yang dag sgrub byed brtson 'grus phyir ldog med pa yin //
analyzed: yang dag sgrub byed brtson 'grus phyir ldog med pa yin //
translated: They are dedicated to practice and are irreversible.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i sa 'di la ni de gnas tshe //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i sa 'di la ni de gnas tshe //
translated: When they are on this delightful bhūmi,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang bsam dga' thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang bsam dga' thob par 'gyur //
translated: they attain the highest motivation and delight in the Dharma.

original: mos pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur dge chos rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: mos pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur dge chos rnam par 'phel //
translated: Their interest increases and they develop virtuous qualities.

original: dri ma rnyog pa the tshom yid gnyis thams cad bsal //
analyzed: dri ma rnyog pa the tshom yid gnyis thams cad bsal //
translated: They clear away all stains, confusion, and doubt.

original: 'di la gnas pa'i mi rab khyu mchog rgyal ba'i sras //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa'i mi rab khyu mchog rgyal ba'i sras //
translated: The supreme humans on this bhūmi, the heirs of the jinas,

original: bde gshegs bye ba du ma mngon par mchod pa byed //
analyzed: bde gshegs bye ba du ma mngon par mchod pa byed //
translated: make offerings to many millions of sugatas.

original: chos kyang nyan byed bstan pa de la rab tu 'byung //
analyzed: chos kyang nyan byed bstan pa de la rab tu 'byung //
translated: They listen to the Dharma and go forth in that teaching.

original: rgyan du byas pa'i gser ltar mi 'phrogs thub pa med //
analyzed: rgyan du byas pa'i gser ltar mi 'phrogs thub pa med //
translated: Like gold that is tested by fire, they cannot be stolen away or destroyed.

original: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan bsam pa dang // ye shes thabs dang spyod pa rnam dag lam la yang //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan bsam pa dang // ye shes thabs dang spyod pa rnam dag lam la yang //
translated: The qualities of the wise who abide in this

original: rnam par bzlog par bdud rnams bye bas mi nus te //
analyzed: rnam par bzlog par bdud rnams bye bas mi nus te //
translated: are not overcome by the māras, even in their millions,🔽in their thoughts, their wisdom, their skillful means, their conduct, their pure path,

original: rin chen 'od la rlung gis chod par mi 'gyur bzhin //
analyzed: rin chen 'od la rlung gis chod par mi 'gyur bzhin //
translated: or in their jewels, light, or wind.

original: mi dang lhas mchod 'os pa 'di la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: mi dang lhas mchod 'os pa 'di la gnas pa yi //
translated: Those who abide in this, worthy of being worshipped by humans and gods,

original: dbang phyug mtshe ma'i dam pa chos la spyod par 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang phyug mtshe ma'i dam pa chos la spyod par 'gyur //
translated: will practice the supreme Dharma of the excellent twins.

original: lta ba'i thibs po rnams las sems can rnam par bzlog /
analyzed: lta ba'i thibs po rnams las sems can rnam par bzlog /
translated: They will turn beings away from the thickets of views

original: rgyal ba'i ye shes don du dge ba'i rab tu brtsom //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i ye shes don du dge ba'i rab tu brtsom //
translated: and will strive for the wisdom of the Victorious Ones.

original: brtson 'grus ldan pas mi yi khyu mchog khrag khrig brgya //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ldan pas mi yi khyu mchog khrag khrig brgya //
translated: The millions of supreme humans who are diligent

original: gzhan du mi sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong //
analyzed: gzhan du mi sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong //
translated: will see this through their extremely concentrated, undistracted minds.

original: yan chad smon lam dam pa yon tan don spyod pa //
analyzed: yan chad smon lam dam pa yon tan don spyod pa //
translated: From this point onward, they will practice the supreme aspirations and the meaning of qualities,

original: ye shes 'byung gnas bskal pa mang por @132a *//🔽mngon par sgrub //
analyzed: ye shes 'byung gnas bskal pa mang por @132a *//🔽mngon par sgrub //
translated: and will accomplish the source of wisdom for many eons.

original: de ltar sa mchog bzhi pa 'di //🔽rnam dag dag pa'i spyod ldan zhing //
analyzed: de ltar sa mchog bzhi pa 'di // rnam dag dag pa'i spyod ldan zhing //
translated: Thus, this fourth supreme ground🔽Is called The Radiant,🔽Endowed with pure conduct,

original: yon tan ye shes don ldan pa //
analyzed: yon tan ye shes don ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the meaning of qualities and wisdom.

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyis bstan //🔽'od 'phro can zhes bya ba ste //🔽byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyis bstan // 'od 'phro can zhes bya ba ste // byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: It is taught by the heirs of the sugatas.🔽This is the fourth bodhisattva ground, The Radiant.

original: bam po bzhi bcu brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu brgyad pa /
translated: CHAPTER 4

original: mkhas pa rnams kyi sa mchog spyod pa thos gyur nas //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyi sa mchog spyod pa thos gyur nas //
translated: Having heard the supreme conduct of the grounds of the wise,

analyzed: chos kyi shes pas rgyal sras rnams ni mgu zhing dga'//

analyzed: dga' ba'i yid kyis mkha' las me tog char yang 'bebs //

analyzed: bdag nyid che ba'i bde gshegs sras po dge zhes brjod //
translated: And proclaim, “Excellent! The heirs of the sugatas are of great benefit!”🔽The lord of the gods, Vaishravana, and the hosts of gods

analyzed: lha yi bdag po dbang sgyur lha yi tshogs rnams dang // dga' bas mkha' la 'phags te bde gshegs mchod pa'i phyir //

original: me tog sna tshogs sprin chen mdog sdug yid 'ong ba //
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs sprin chen mdog sdug yid 'ong ba //

analyzed: dga' zhing mos pas bde bar gshegs la mngon par gtor //

analyzed: glu dbyangs snyan pa yid 'ong sil snyan rnga yi sgra /
translated: “The beautiful and pleasant sounds of song, the sounds of cymbals and drums,

analyzed: lha tshogs mang pos rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du byas //
translated: Were made by many hosts of gods to worship the Victorious One.

analyzed: rgyal ba de tshe rab tu 'phrul ba'i sku yang ston //

analyzed: sgra dbyangs rnam pa kun las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ngo //
translated: And from all kinds of sounds, this sound arose:

analyzed: yun ring mchog gis thub pa'i dgongs pa rdzogs //
translated: “The Sage’s intention was fulfilled for a long time,

original: yun ring mchog gis thub pas byang chub brnyes //
analyzed: yun ring mchog gis thub pas byang chub brnyes //
translated: For a long time, the Sage attained enlightenment.

original: lha mi phan pa yun ring mchog gis mthong //
analyzed: lha mi phan pa yun ring mchog gis mthong //

analyzed: lha yi gnas su sh'akya thub pa @132b gshegs //

original: yun ring mchog gis rgya mtsho'i chu yang g-yos //
analyzed: yun ring mchog gis rgya mtsho'i chu yang g-yos //
translated: For a long time, the waters of the ocean moved.

original: yun ring mchog gis 'od bzang thub pas bkye //
analyzed: yun ring mchog gis 'od bzang thub pas bkye //
translated: For a long time, the Sage emitted beautiful light.

original: yun ring mchog gis sems can bde bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yun ring mchog gis sems can bde bar 'gyur //

original: thugs rje che gsung yun ring mchog gis thos //
analyzed: thugs rje che gsung yun ring mchog gis thos //

original: yun ring mchog gis thub pa che dang phrad //
analyzed: yun ring mchog gis thub pa che dang phrad //
translated: For a long time, the great Sage was encountered.

original: yon tan kun gyi mtha' phyin da byon to //
analyzed: yon tan kun gyi mtha' phyin da byon to //

original: nga rgyal dregs snyems mun pa kun spangs te //
analyzed: nga rgyal dregs snyems mun pa kun spangs te //

original: mtshungs med mchod par 'os la mchod par gyis //
analyzed: mtshungs med mchod par 'os la mchod par gyis //
translated: Worship the incomparable one who is worthy of offerings.

original: de la mchod byas bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro /
analyzed: de la mchod byas bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro /

original: de la mchod byas bde ba rnam pa mang //
analyzed: de la mchod byas bde ba rnam pa mang //

original: de la mchod byas sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang //
analyzed: de la mchod byas sdug bsngal thams cad 'byang //

original: de la mchod byas rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob //
analyzed: de la mchod byas rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob //
translated: Having made offerings to him, you will attain the wisdom of the Victorious Ones.

original: rgyal ba mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa ste //
analyzed: rgyal ba mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa ste //
translated: The Victorious Ones are as pure as space,

original: 'gro bas mi gos padmo'i chu dang 'dra //
analyzed: 'gro bas mi gos padmo'i chu dang 'dra //

original: shin tu 'phags pa rgya mtsho'i ri rab bzhin //
analyzed: shin tu 'phags pa rgya mtsho'i ri rab bzhin //

analyzed: spro ba'i sems kyis rgyal ba mchod gyis shig /
translated: With a joyful mind, make offerings to the Victorious Ones.

original: de skad dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
analyzed: de skad dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
translated: Having spoken these words in song,

original: lha yi bu mo brgya mang ba //🔽dga' bas rgyas pas rab tu lta //
analyzed: lha yi bu mo brgya mang ba // dga' bas rgyas pas rab tu lta //
translated: The many hundreds of celestial maidens🔽Gloriously expanded with joy

original: shin tu dga' bas rim gror byed //
analyzed: shin tu dga' bas rim gror byed //
translated: And served with the utmost delight.

original: de nas rdo rje'i snying po la //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i snying po la //
translated: Then, to the one with a vajra-like essence,

original: rnam thar zla bas smras pa ni //
analyzed: rnam thar zla bas smras pa ni //
translated: Vimukti candra said:

original: sa lnga'i rnam pa ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: sa lnga'i rnam pa ci 'dra ba //

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad par mdzod //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad par mdzod //

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: Bodhisattva Vajra Heart said,

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,🔽in that way,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/
translated: the bodhisattva

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i @133a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa ni / byang chub sems dpa'i @133a *//
translated: who has completed the path of the fourth bodhisattva ground

original: sa lnga pa la 'jug ste /
analyzed: sa lnga pa la 'jug ste /
translated: enters the fifth bodhisattva ground.

original: de sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug go /
analyzed: de sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug go /
translated: He enters it with ten equalities of pure mental attitude.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:🔽the equality of the pure mental attitude of the qualities of the buddhas of the past,🔽the equality of the pure mental attitude of the qualities of the buddhas of the future,

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: and the equality of the pure mental attitude of the qualities of the buddhas of the present.

original: tshul khrims kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang // sems kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lta ba dang / nem nur dang / dogs pa bsal bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang // sems kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lta ba dang / nem nur dang / dogs pa bsal bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: They are the same in their pure attitude of discipline, the same in their pure attitude of mind, the same in their pure attitude of eliminating views, doubts, and hesitation,

original: lam dang lam yin pa shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / nan tan dang spong ba shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad gong nas gong du rnam par bsgom pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: lam dang lam yin pa shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / nan tan dang spong ba shes pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad gong nas gong du rnam par bsgom pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: the same in their pure attitude of knowing the path and what is not the path, the same in their pure attitude of knowing practice and abandonment, the same in their pure attitude of cultivating the aspects of enlightenment higher and higher,

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: and the same in their pure attitude of ripening all beings.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors,

original: sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa bcu po 'di dag gis de la 'jug ste /
analyzed: sems kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa bcu po 'di dag gis de la 'jug ste /
translated: they enter into this with ten pure attitudes.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O sons of the victors,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga @133b thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang / lam gyi yan lag de dag nyid la sbyang ba shin tu byas shing lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pas de'i gong du lam gyi khyad par tshol zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga @133b thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang / lam gyi yan lag de dag nyid la sbyang ba shin tu byas shing lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pas de'i gong du lam gyi khyad par tshol zhing /
translated: The bodhisattva who has attained the five bodhisattva levels, having trained very well in those very factors of enlightenment and path factors, and having purified his superior intention, seeks the special path above that.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / smon lam gyi mthu dang / shugs dang / snying rje dang / byams pas sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu bsags pa dang / yongs su rgyun chad pa med pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / smon lam gyi mthu dang / shugs dang / snying rje dang / byams pas sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu bsags pa dang / yongs su rgyun chad pa med pa dang /
translated: He does not abandon sentient beings due to his entry into suchness, the power and force of his aspirational prayers, compassion, and love, and he accumulates the collections of merit and wisdom, and he is uninterrupted.

original: thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gong nas gong du sa'i snang ba blta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs btsal ba dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rig pa dang / blo'i stobs dang shugs kyi sa yid la bya ba'i phyir mi zlog par byas te /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gong nas gong du sa'i snang ba blta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs btsal ba dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rig pa dang / blo'i stobs dang shugs kyi sa yid la bya ba'i phyir mi zlog par byas te /
translated: They are not discouraged from the practice of skill in means, from looking at the appearance of the stages higher and higher, from seeking the blessings of the Tathagatas, from keeping in mind the stage of the power and force of mindfulness, understanding, awareness, and cognition.

original: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba /
analyzed: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba /
translated: They know perfectly as it is: “This is the noble truth of suffering.”🔽“This is the origin of suffering.”

original: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa /
analyzed: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa /
translated: “This is the cessation of suffering.”

original: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /🔽de kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mkhas pa yin /🔽don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te / de kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mkhas pa yin / don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: “This is the noble truth of the path that leads to the cessation of suffering.”🔽They are skilled in conventional truth.🔽They are skilled in ultimate truth.

original: mtshan nyid kyi bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: They are skilled in the truth of characteristics.

original: rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: He is skilled in the truth of differentiation.

original: brtag pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /🔽dngos @134a *// po'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: brtag pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin / dngos @134a *// po'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: He is skilled in the truth of investigation.🔽He is skilled in the truth of reality.

original: 'byung ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: He is skilled in the truth of origination.

original: byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: He is skilled in the truth of purification and non-arising.

original: lam gyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: lam gyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: He is skilled in the truth of engaging in the wisdom of the path.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rim pa mtshams sbyar ba grub par bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bskyed pa'i bar du mkhas pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rim pa mtshams sbyar ba grub par bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bskyed pa'i bar du mkhas pa yin te /
translated: He is skilled in the stages of the Bodhisattva grounds, up to the perfect generation of the wisdom of the Tathagatas.

original: de sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu dga' bar byed pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu dga' bar byed pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the conventional truth by delighting other beings and other individuals according to their thoughts.

original: theg pa gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bas don dam pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: theg pa gcig tu yang dag par gzhol bas don dam pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the ultimate truth by correctly engaging in the one vehicle.

original: chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid khong du chud pas mtshan nyid kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes so; ;chos kyi bye brag rnam par dgod pa khong du chud pas rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid khong du chud pas mtshan nyid kyi bden pa yang rab tu shes so; ;chos kyi bye brag rnam par dgod pa khong du chud pas rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He also knows the truth of characteristics, having understood the intrinsic characteristics of phenomena. He also knows the truth of classification, having understood the classification of the specific characteristics of phenomena.

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par dgod pas rtog ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par dgod pas rtog ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He also knows the truth of designation, having understood the classification of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: lus dang sems la gnod pa nyams su 'bab pas dngos po'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: lus dang sems la gnod pa nyams su 'bab pas dngos po'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He also knows the truth of things, having understood the harm to body and mind.

original: 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi mtshams sbyor bas 'byung ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi mtshams sbyor bas 'byung ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He also knows the truth of origination, having understood the connection between the realms of beings.

original: rims dang yongs su gdung ba thams cad shin tu zhi bas byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rims dang yongs su gdung ba thams cad shin tu zhi bas byang zhing mi skye ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He also knows the truth of purification and non-arising, having understood the complete pacification of all fevers and afflictions.

original: mi gnyis pas mngon @134b par bsgrub pas lam gyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mi gnyis pas mngon @134b par bsgrub pas lam gyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He also knows the truth of engaging the wisdom of the path, having understood the non-dual accomplishment.

original: rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rim pa thams cad mtshams sbyar ba rab tu bsgrub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rim pa thams cad mtshams sbyar ba rab tu bsgrub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba'i bden pa yang rab tu shes so /
translated: He also knows the truth of the arising of the wisdom of the Tathagatas by the accomplishment of the connection with all the stages of the Bodhisattva and with the attainment of full enlightenment in all ways.

original: de 'ang mos pas shes pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis te lhag ma ma lus par ye shes khong du chud pas ni ma yin no //🔽de de ltar bden pa la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blos 'dus byas thams cad gsob gsog rdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can dku byed pa /
analyzed: de 'ang mos pas shes pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis te lhag ma ma lus par ye shes khong du chud pas ni ma yin no // de de ltar bden pa la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blos 'dus byas thams cad gsob gsog rdzun pa bslu ba'i chos can dku byed pa /
translated: And that is by the power of understanding through conviction, not by the power of understanding through direct experience.

original: byis pa 'drid par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: byis pa 'drid par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: With a mind that has accomplished the skill in the truths, he knows as it truly is that all conditioned things are hollow, false, deceptive, and beguiling.

original: de sngon pas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sngon pas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: And his compassion for all beings becomes greater than before.

original: byams pa chen po'i snang ba yang rab tu 'byung ste /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i snang ba yang rab tu 'byung ste /
translated: And the light of his great love shines forth.

original: de de ltar ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs rab tu thob cing sems can thams cad la lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rab tu rtog ste /
analyzed: de de ltar ye shes kyi stobs dang shugs rab tu thob cing sems can thams cad la lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rab tu rtog ste /
translated: In this way, having attained the power and strength of wisdom, and looking at all sentient beings, and being devoted to the wisdom of the Buddha, he thoroughly understands the beginning and end of all aspects of conditioned existence.

original: 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha'i ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las rab tu byung ba'i sems can 'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha'i ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las rab tu byung ba'i sems can 'khor ba'i rgyud du 'bab pa /
translated: Thus, sentient beings who arise from ignorance, craving, and existence in the past, who flow in the stream of saṃsāra,

original: phung po'i gnas las ma 'phags pa /
analyzed: phung po'i gnas las ma 'phags pa /
translated: who have not risen above the abode of the aggregates,

original: sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po /
translated: who are a great mass of suffering,

original: bdag med pa /
analyzed: bdag med pa /
translated: who are selfless,

original: sems can med pa /
analyzed: sems can med pa /
translated: who are without sentient beings,

original: srog med pa /
analyzed: srog med pa /
translated: who are without life,

original: gso @135a *// ba med pa /
analyzed: gso @135a *// ba med pa /
translated: who are without nourishment,

original: gang zag med pa /
analyzed: gang zag med pa /
translated: who are without persons,

original: bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba /
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba /
translated: who are free from self and mine,

original: rnam par 'phel lo zhes de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par 'phel lo zhes de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: he also knows that they increase in the same way that they truly are.

original: 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' med pa la rmongs pa'i 'dod pa 'di nyid rgyun gcad pa dang / mthar dbyung ba dang / 'byung bar bya ba dang / yod pa dang med pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' med pa la rmongs pa'i 'dod pa 'di nyid rgyun gcad pa dang / mthar dbyung ba dang / 'byung bar bya ba dang / yod pa dang med pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: In this way, they will put an end to the desire that is confused about the future, and they will know the future as it truly is, in terms of its continuity, its end, its arising, its existence, and its nonexistence.

original: de 'di snyam du sems so //
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems so //
translated: “ They will think,

original: de ltar lus grangs med pa zhig 'gags la 'gag par 'gyur zhing 'gag bzhin te /
analyzed: de ltar lus grangs med pa zhig 'gags la 'gag par 'gyur zhing 'gag bzhin te /
translated: ‘In this way, countless bodies have ceased, are ceasing, and will cease.

original: 'di ltar rgud par 'gyur yang lus la skyo ba mi skyed cing /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgud par 'gyur yang lus la skyo ba mi skyed cing /
translated: Even though they are decaying in this way, they do not become disenchanted with the body.

original: sdug bsngal gyi 'khrul 'khor je bas je 'phel du byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog cing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi 'khrul 'khor je bas je 'phel du byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog cing /
translated: They increase the machine of suffering and do not turn back from the continuum of saṃsāra.

original: phung po'i gnas mi gtong ba dang / khams kyi sbrul gyis skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu mi 'byin cing /
analyzed: phung po'i gnas mi gtong ba dang / khams kyi sbrul gyis skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu mi 'byin cing /
translated: They do not give up the abode of the aggregates, they do not become disenchanted with the snakes of the elements, and they do not extract the splinters of pride and views.

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me lce 'bar ba zhi bar mi byed pa dang; ma rig pa'i mun pa chen po mi sel cing /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me lce 'bar ba zhi bar mi byed pa dang; ma rig pa'i mun pa chen po mi sel cing /
translated: They do not extinguish the blazing flames of desire, anger, and ignorance, nor do they dispel the great darkness of ignorance.

original: srid pa'i mtsho mi skem la /
analyzed: srid pa'i mtsho mi skem la /
translated: They do not dry up the ocean of existence.

original: stobs bcu'i ded dpon mi tshol zhing /
analyzed: stobs bcu'i ded dpon mi tshol zhing /
translated: They do not seek out the captain of the ten powers.

original: bdud kyi bsam pa thibs po'i rjes su song ste /
analyzed: bdud kyi bsam pa thibs po'i rjes su song ste /
translated: They follow the thick intentions of Māra.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi chu srin gyis dkrugs pas yongs su g-yeng bar 'khod cing /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi chu srin gyis dkrugs pas yongs su g-yeng bar 'khod cing /
translated: They are distracted by the sea monster of various thoughts in the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag de ltar mi shes shing rmongs pa ni ngo @135b mtshar che'i /
analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag de ltar mi shes shing rmongs pa ni ngo @135b mtshar che'i /
translated: It is amazing that those ordinary, childish beings do not know and are confused in that way.

original: ma la / bdag gis sems can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba /🔽mgon med pa /🔽dpung gnyen med pa /
analyzed: ma la / bdag gis sems can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba / mgon med pa / dpung gnyen med pa /
translated: However, I will liberate those beings who are tormented by suffering,🔽who are without a protector,

original: skyabs med pa /🔽gnas med pa /🔽gzhi med pa /
analyzed: skyabs med pa / gnas med pa / gzhi med pa /
translated: who are without a defender,🔽who are without a refuge,🔽who are without a support,🔽who are without a basis,

original: rten med pa /
analyzed: rten med pa /
translated: who are without a foundation,

original: long bar gyur pa /
analyzed: long bar gyur pa /
translated: who are blind,

original: ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang / pris yog pa /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang / pris yog pa /
translated: and who are covered by the shell of ignorance.

original: mun pas khebs pa de dag gi don du bdag gcig pu gnyis su med pas bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rnam par bsags par bya ba /
analyzed: mun pas khebs pa de dag gi don du bdag gcig pu gnyis su med pas bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rnam par bsags par bya ba /
translated: For the sake of those who are covered in darkness, I alone, without a second, will accumulate the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: ji lta bur bsags pas sems can de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyi ye shes chags pa med pa'i bar gyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsod nams dang /🔽ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par bya'am ci snyam ste /
analyzed: ji lta bur bsags pas sems can de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyi ye shes chags pa med pa'i bar gyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par bya'am ci snyam ste /
translated: What kind of merit and wisdom should I accumulate so that those sentient beings will attain complete purity and attain the culmination of the wisdom of the ten powers, up to the absence of attachment?

original: de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba dang /
analyzed: de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i blos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba dang /
translated: Thus, with a mind that is accomplished through the wisdom of thorough investigation, whatever roots of virtue I begin, I will dedicate them all for the sake of protecting all sentient beings, for the benefit of all sentient beings, for the happiness of all sentient beings,

original: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la gtse ba med pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad drang ba dang / sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang /🔽sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / sems can thams @136a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la gtse ba med pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad drang ba dang / sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / sems can thams @136a *//
translated: They are dedicated to benefiting all sentient beings, to protecting all sentient beings, to caring for all sentient beings, to being loving to all sentient beings, to being compassionate to all sentient beings, to being sympathetic to all sentient beings, to being free of hostility toward all sentient beings, to being kind to all sentient beings, to being honest with all sentient beings, to being faithful to all sentient beings,🔽to guiding all sentient beings,

original: cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rab tu rtsom ste /
analyzed: cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rab tu rtsom ste /
translated: and to liberating all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa shin tu khyab par dga' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa shin tu khyab par dga' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
translated: “The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, Very Joyful,🔽is even more unassailable by the afflictions.

original: de bas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyis dran pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: de bas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyis dran pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with mindfulness through the nature of nonforgetfulness.

original: shin tu nges par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis blo gros dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: shin tu nges par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis blo gros dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with intelligence through the wisdom of ascertainment.

original: mdo'i don dang / tshul dang / ldem po dag khong du chud pas rig pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: mdo'i don dang / tshul dang / ldem po dag khong du chud pas rig pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with knowledge through understanding the meaning, the method, and the underlying intent of the sūtras.

original: bdag de gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin /
analyzed: bdag de gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin /
translated: They are conscientious and have a sense of shame, since they protect the minds of others.

original: sdom pa dang tshul ma bor bas dga' ba dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: sdom pa dang tshul ma bor bas dga' ba dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are joyful, since they do not abandon the vows and moral discipline.

original: gnas dang gnas pa ma yin pa la mkhas shing shin tu brtags pas blo dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: gnas dang gnas pa ma yin pa la mkhas shing shin tu brtags pas blo dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are intelligent, since they are skilled in what is possible and impossible and are very discerning.

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They have wisdom, since they are not led by others.

original: don dang don ma yin pa'i tshig yang dag par dbye ba la mkhas pas shes rab dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: don dang don ma yin pa'i tshig yang dag par dbye ba la mkhas pas shes rab dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They have insight, since they are skilled in distinguishing what is meaningful from what is not.

original: bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa thob pa yin /
analyzed: bsgom pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa thob pa yin /
translated: They have attained the accomplishment of superknowledge, since they are skilled in accomplishing meditation.

original: 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang bas thabs la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang bas thabs la mkhas pa yin /
translated: They are skilled in means, since they follow the world.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar gsog pas ngom mi shes pa yin /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar gsog pas ngom mi shes pa yin /
translated: They are insatiable, since they accumulate the collection of merit.

original: ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa yin /
translated: They are indefatigable, since they seek the collection of wisdom.

original: byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par gsog pas @136b skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par gsog pas @136b skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They have the attitude of never tiring of gathering the accumulations of love and great compassion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su tshol bas snyom las med par yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su tshol bas snyom las med par yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin /
translated: They are diligent in their indefatigable quest for the strengths, fearlessnesses, and unique qualities of the thus-gone ones.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan mngon par shom pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan mngon par shom pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They have the intention to accomplish the adornments and the creation of a buddha realm.

original: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yang dag par bsgrub pas dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brtson pa yin /
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yang dag par bsgrub pas dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brtson pa yin /
translated: They are diligent in the various kinds of virtue in order to accomplish the major and minor marks.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su tshol bas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su tshol bas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson pa yin /
translated: They are constantly and continuously diligent in their quest for the adornments of the thus-gone ones’ body, speech, and mind.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos smra ba thams cad la rim gro byed pas bsnyen bkur dang / sri zhu chen po'i ngang tshul can yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos smra ba thams cad la rim gro byed pas bsnyen bkur dang / sri zhu chen po'i ngang tshul can yin /
translated: He is respectful and reverential to all bodhisattvas and Dharma teachers, and he is very attentive to them.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ngang tshul dang ldan par 'jig rten du rgyu bas khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ngang tshul dang ldan par 'jig rten du rgyu bas khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is free from anger, for he moves in the world with the attitude of bodhicitta and great skill in means.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pas nyin mtshan du gzhan du sems pa'i yid yongs su spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pas nyin mtshan du gzhan du sems pa'i yid yongs su spangs pa yin te /
translated: He has completely abandoned any other thought than that of ripening all sentient beings, and he is intent on this day and night.

original: de de ltar mngon par brtson pas sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: de de ltar mngon par brtson pas sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: He ripens beings through generosity,🔽through pleasant speech,🔽through meaningful conduct,🔽through conformity,🔽through revealing his physical form,

original: ngag snyan pa dang / don bsgrub pa dang / don mthun pa dang / gzugs kyi lus kun tu bstan pa dang / chos bshad @137a *//
analyzed: ngag snyan pa dang / don bsgrub pa dang / don mthun pa dang / gzugs kyi lus kun tu bstan pa dang / chos bshad @137a *//
translated: and through teaching the Dharma.

original: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid smos pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa bstan pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yon tan yongs su grags par bya ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang /
analyzed: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid smos pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes pa bstan pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yon tan yongs su grags par bya ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang /
translated: the bodhisattva conduct, the greatness of the tathāgatas, the faults of saṃsāra, the qualities of the wisdom of the buddhas,

original: rnam par 'phrul pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bya ba dang / thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sbyor bas sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bya ba dang / thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sbyor bas sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: the accomplishment of great miracles and manifestations, and the ripening of beings through various activities and methods.

original: de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: Thus, with diligence in ripening beings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i bsam pa can /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'i bsam pa can /
translated: with an intention that accords with the wisdom of the buddhas,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
translated: and with the application of irreversible roots of virtue,

original: khyad par can gyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa de gang 'di 'jig rten na yod pa'i yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / lag brda dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / shod thabs la sogs pa dang / khams kyi cho ga dang; gso ba'i cho ga dang /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa de gang 'di 'jig rten na yod pa'i yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / lag brda dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / shod thabs la sogs pa dang / khams kyi cho ga dang; gso ba'i cho ga dang /
translated: He was dedicated to the pursuit of the special Dharma. He was skilled in the worldly activities of writing, the Vedas, sign language, mathematics, accounting, and so on, as well as the rites of the elements, the rites of healing,

original: skem pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon bsal pa dang / dug dang ro langs kyi sbyor ba bsal ba dang / rang bzo dang / gar gyi cho ga dang / gtam dang / rol mo dang / sgrung gtam la dga' bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: skem pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon bsal pa dang / dug dang ro langs kyi sbyor ba bsal ba dang / rang bzo dang / gar gyi cho ga dang / gtam dang / rol mo dang / sgrung gtam la dga' bskyed pa dang /
translated: the removal of epilepsy, forgetfulness, and spirit possession, the removal of poison and zombie spells, the rites of dance and drama, and the delighting of people through storytelling, music, and tales.

original: grong dang grong khyer dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / @137b rdzing bu dang / me tog dang / shing tog dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gser dang /
analyzed: grong dang grong khyer dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / chu klung dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / @137b rdzing bu dang / me tog dang / shing tog dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gser dang /
translated: He was skilled in the construction of towns, cities, parks, rivers, ponds, pools, lotus flowers, fruit trees, medicinal plants, and forests, as well as in the production of gold,

original: dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / rin po che sh'i la dang / byi ru dang / rin po che rnams kyi 'byung gnas bstan pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang /
analyzed: dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / rin po che sh'i la dang / byi ru dang / rin po che rnams kyi 'byung gnas bstan pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang /
translated: the source of silver, jewels, pearls, beryl, conch shells, śaila gems, coral, and precious substances; the sun, moon, planets,

original: rgyu skar dang / sa g-yo ba dang / ri dvags kyi ltas dang / rmi lam dang ltas bstan pa la 'jug pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi mtshan dang / spyod pa'i mtshan dang / sdom pa dang / tshul dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: rgyu skar dang / sa g-yo ba dang / ri dvags kyi ltas dang / rmi lam dang ltas bstan pa la 'jug pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi mtshan dang / spyod pa'i mtshan dang / sdom pa dang / tshul dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: constellations, earthquakes, animal omens, dreams, and portents; the marks of the major and minor body parts, the marks of conduct, vows, conduct, and meditative concentration;

original: mngon par shes pa dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i gnas rnams dang / gzhan yang gang sems can la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang; bde bar 'gyur ba yod dgu de dag thams cad 'jig rten la snying brtse bas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i gnas rnams dang / gzhan yang gang sems can la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang; bde bar 'gyur ba yod dgu de dag thams cad 'jig rten la snying brtse bas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: He also accomplishes the superknowledges, the immeasurables, the formless states, and whatever else does not harm sentient beings, and whatever is conducive to the benefit and happiness of all sentient beings, in order to gradually establish the world in the Buddha’s teaching out of love for the world.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: “The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, Very Difficult to Conquer, through the power of his vast view and his prayers, sees many buddhas.

original: lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas @138a *//
analyzed: lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas @138a *//
translated: Through the power of his vast view and his prayers, he will see many hundreds of buddhas, many thousands of buddhas, many hundreds of thousands of buddhas,

original: bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrig khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrig khrig brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: many hundred of millions of buddhas, many billions of buddhas, many tens of billions of buddhas, many trillions of buddhas, many quintillions of buddhas.
