analyzed: de dag sa mchog lnga pa'i phyogs su phyin gyur nas //
translated: Having reached the fifth ground, the supreme one,

original: yongs su dag pa'i lam rnam phyir zhing gong du sbyong //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i lam rnam phyir zhing gong du sbyong //
translated: The path of complete purity is ever more refined.

original: bsam dag mkhas pa rgyal ba 'thob @141a *//🔽par bya don du //
analyzed: bsam dag mkhas pa rgyal ba 'thob @141a *// par bya don du //
translated: With pure intention, skill, and the goal of attaining buddhahood,

original: skyo ba med par snying rje byams pa'i rjes su sems //
analyzed: skyo ba med par snying rje byams pa'i rjes su sems //
translated: With compassion and love, without ever tiring,

original: bsod nams tshogs bsags de bzhin ye shes rab ldan pa //
analyzed: bsod nams tshogs bsags de bzhin ye shes rab ldan pa //
translated: Accumulating the collections of merit and wisdom,

original: sa rnams snang bar bya phyir gcig min thabs rtog cing //
analyzed: sa rnams snang bar bya phyir gcig min thabs rtog cing //
translated: In order to illuminate the levels, they conceive of methods that are not one.

original: sangs rgyas byin gyis dran dang blo gros blo thob pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byin gyis dran dang blo gros blo thob pas //
translated: Through the buddhas’ blessings, they attain mindfulness, understanding, and intelligence

original: bden pa bzhi po ma lus yang dag khong du chud //🔽don dam bden pa de bzhin kun rdzob mtshan bden dang // rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa de bzhin brtag bden dang // 'byung zhing 'jug dang dngos po bzhi lam bden pa nas //
analyzed: bden pa bzhi po ma lus yang dag khong du chud // don dam bden pa de bzhin kun rdzob mtshan bden dang // rnam par dbye ba'i bden pa de bzhin brtag bden dang // 'byung zhing 'jug dang dngos po bzhi lam bden pa nas //
translated: And fully comprehend all four noble truths.🔽They fully comprehend the ultimate truth, the truth of the characteristics of the relative,🔽The truth of differentiation, the truth of investigation,🔽The truth of the path of the four processes of emergence and engagement,

original: sgrib med bden pa'i bar du yang dag rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: sgrib med bden pa'i bar du yang dag rab tu rtogs //
translated: And the truth of the absence of obscurations.

original: de ltar bden pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo phra yang //
analyzed: de ltar bden pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo phra yang //
translated: Though their subtle minds are purified by such truths,

original: rnam thar dam pa sgrib med de ni thob pa min //
analyzed: rnam thar dam pa sgrib med de ni thob pa min //
translated: They have not yet attained the holy liberation that is free of obscurations.

original: ye shes mos yangs yon tan rnams kyi 'byung gnas te //
analyzed: ye shes mos yangs yon tan rnams kyi 'byung gnas te //
translated: The source of the qualities of vast wisdom and interest,

original: 'gro kun dgra bcom rang rgyal rnams ni zil gyis gnon //
analyzed: 'gro kun dgra bcom rang rgyal rnams ni zil gyis gnon //
translated: They surpass the arhats and pratyekabuddhas of the entire world.

original: de dag bden pas de ltar rang gi blos bsgrubs pas //
analyzed: de dag bden pas de ltar rang gi blos bsgrubs pas //
translated: By the truth of that, they are accomplished by their own minds.

original: 'dus byas rdzun zhing rang bzhin snying po med par shes //
analyzed: 'dus byas rdzun zhing rang bzhin snying po med par shes //
translated: They know that conditioned things are false and have no core.

original: sems can don du bde gshegs ye shes tshol ba'i tshe //
analyzed: sems can don du bde gshegs ye shes tshol ba'i tshe //
translated: When they are seeking the wisdom of the sugatas for the sake of sentient beings,

original: bde gshegs thugs brtse byams pa snang ba rab tu 'thob //
analyzed: bde gshegs thugs brtse byams pa snang ba rab tu 'thob //
translated: They attain the light of the love and compassion of the sugatas.

original: 'dus byas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhas pa rab tu lta //
analyzed: 'dus byas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhas pa rab tu lta //
translated: The wise ones look at the beginning and end of conditioned things.

original: gti mug mun gnag mun pas 'khrugs shing sred chags pa'i //
analyzed: gti mug mun gnag mun pas 'khrugs shing sred chags pa'i //
translated: The world is confused by the darkness of ignorance and the murk of craving.

original: 'gro rnams sdug bsngal phung po lta ba bdag med cing //
analyzed: 'gro rnams sdug bsngal phung po lta ba bdag med cing //
translated: They clear away the mass of suffering of beings, who are without a self,

original: srog @141b bral rtsva shing 'dra ba mngon par sel ba byed //🔽nyon mongs rjes 'gro 'di dag 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i //
analyzed: srog @141b bral rtsva shing 'dra ba mngon par sel ba byed // nyon mongs rjes 'gro 'di dag 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i //
translated: Who are like grass and trees, without a life force.🔽They do not measure the end of the continuum of suffering

original: sdug bsngal rgyun gcod mthar phyin gzhal bar yong mi byed //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rgyun gcod mthar phyin gzhal bar yong mi byed //
translated: Of these beings who follow the afflictions, past and future.

original: kyi hud 'gro ba de ltar 'khyams zhes snying rje skye //
analyzed: kyi hud 'gro ba de ltar 'khyams zhes snying rje skye //
translated: “Alas! Beings wander like this!”

original: gti mug 'khrul pas 'khor ba'i rgyud du phyir mi ldog /
analyzed: gti mug 'khrul pas 'khor ba'i rgyud du phyir mi ldog /
translated: They are confused by delusion and do not turn back from saṃsāra.

original: phung po'i gnas dang khams sprul lta bu'i zug rngu can //
analyzed: phung po'i gnas dang khams sprul lta bu'i zug rngu can //
translated: The aggregates are their dwelling, and the elements are like the pain of a dart.

original: mes gdungs yid can sgrib pa'i mun pas bsgribs gyur pa //
analyzed: mes gdungs yid can sgrib pa'i mun pas bsgribs gyur pa //
translated: Their minds are tormented by fire and obscured by the darkness of obscurations.

original: don rnams rnam par ma brtags sred pa'i mtshor lhung zhing //
analyzed: don rnams rnam par ma brtags sred pa'i mtshor lhung zhing //
translated: They have not examined the meaning and have fallen into the ocean of craving.

original: rgyal ba'i ded dpon bral ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i ded dpon bral ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas //
translated: They are without the captain of the Victorious Ones and remain in an ocean of suffering.

original: de ltar rig nas bag yod phyir zhing rab tu rtsom //
analyzed: de ltar rig nas bag yod phyir zhing rab tu rtsom //
translated: Knowing this, they are careful and make efforts again and again.

original: ci rtsom kun kyang 'gro ba rnam thar don du ste //
analyzed: ci rtsom kun kyang 'gro ba rnam thar don du ste //
translated: Whatever they do, they do it for the sake of liberating beings.

original: phyir zhing dran ldan blo gros rig dang ldan pa yin //
analyzed: phyir zhing dran ldan blo gros rig dang ldan pa yin //
translated: They are mindful, intelligent, and wise.

original: khrel yod dga' ldan mkhas pa blo ldan shes rab ldan //
analyzed: khrel yod dga' ldan mkhas pa blo ldan shes rab ldan //
translated: They are modest, joyful, skilled, intelligent, and have wisdom.

original: bsod nams bsags dang ye shes dam pas mi ngoms shing //
analyzed: bsod nams bsags dang ye shes dam pas mi ngoms shing //
translated: They accumulate merit and are insatiable with the highest wisdom.

original: rtag tu skyo med le lo med par thos pa tshol //
analyzed: rtag tu skyo med le lo med par thos pa tshol //
translated: They always seek learning without weariness or laziness.

original: zhing sgrub rgyal ba'i mtshan dang sangs rgyas gsung tshol zhing //
analyzed: zhing sgrub rgyal ba'i mtshan dang sangs rgyas gsung tshol zhing //
translated: They cultivate fields, and seek the names of the Victorious Ones and the speech of the Buddhas.

original: sems can phan par brtson pa'i bya bas ngoms mi shes //
analyzed: sems can phan par brtson pa'i bya bas ngoms mi shes //
translated: They are never satisfied with the activities that strive to benefit sentient beings.

original: 'gro ba smin bya'i don du mkhas pas bzo yi gnas //
analyzed: 'gro ba smin bya'i don du mkhas pas bzo yi gnas //
translated: In order to ripen beings, the wise ones engage in the arts,

original: yi ge lag brda grangs dang rtsis dang gso ba'i thabs //
analyzed: yi ge lag brda grangs dang rtsis dang gso ba'i thabs //
translated: such as writing, sign language, mathematics, and medicine,

original: 'byung po'i gdon dang las rnams sna tshogs bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'byung po'i gdon dang las rnams sna tshogs bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to dispel various elemental spirits, afflictions, and actions.

original: snying brtse byams pa'i blo gsal gtsug lag kun la gzhol //🔽rang bzo mchog dang gar sdug @142a *//
analyzed: snying brtse byams pa'i blo gsal gtsug lag kun la gzhol // rang bzo mchog dang gar sdug @142a *//
translated: With a clear mind of loving compassion, they apply themselves to all the sciences.🔽They display various delightful things,

original: sna tshogs dga' byed dang // chu klung ra ba shing tog me tog 'dug gnas dang // bya ba sna tshogs sgrub byed sems can bde don du //
analyzed: sna tshogs dga' byed dang // chu klung ra ba shing tog me tog 'dug gnas dang // bya ba sna tshogs sgrub byed sems can bde don du //
translated: such as their own supreme creations, dance, song, and music, rivers, parks, fruits, flowers, resting places, and various activities, for the sake of sentient beings' happiness.

original: rin chen 'byung gnas du ma'ang nye bar ston pa byed //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung gnas du ma'ang nye bar ston pa byed //
translated: They also display many sources of jewels.

original: sa g-yo nyi zla gza' skar kun kyang de bzhin du //
analyzed: sa g-yo nyi zla gza' skar kun kyang de bzhin du //
translated: Earthquakes, eclipses of the sun and moon, and all the stars

original: sems can yan lag mtshan ma'i dpyad dang rgyal srid gnas //
analyzed: sems can yan lag mtshan ma'i dpyad dang rgyal srid gnas //
translated: are also like that, as are the limbs and marks of sentient beings, and the abodes of kingship.

original: gzugs med bsam gtan mngon shes mchog dang tshad med pa //
analyzed: gzugs med bsam gtan mngon shes mchog dang tshad med pa //
translated: The formless, the concentrations, the superknowledges, and the immeasurables,

original: 'gro la bde dang phan pa'i don 'dod mngon par bsgrub //
analyzed: 'gro la bde dang phan pa'i don 'dod mngon par bsgrub //
translated: They accomplish for the sake of the happiness and benefit of beings.

original: shin tu rgyal dka' 'di thob shes rab mchog spyod pa //
analyzed: shin tu rgyal dka' 'di thob shes rab mchog spyod pa //
translated: They attain this, so difficult to attain, and practice the supreme wisdom;

original: sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed chos rnams nyan par byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed chos rnams nyan par byed //
translated: They make offerings to millions of buddhas and listen to the Dharma.

original: de dag dge dang bsam pa phyir zhing dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag dge dang bsam pa phyir zhing dag par 'gyur //
translated: Their virtue and intention become ever more pure,

original: gser sbram ji ltar mu sar gal bas btab pa bzhin //
analyzed: gser sbram ji ltar mu sar gal bas btab pa bzhin //
translated: Like gold inlaid with more gold,

original: ji ltar bar snang gza' yi rin chen gzhal med khang //
analyzed: ji ltar bar snang gza' yi rin chen gzhal med khang //
translated: Like a precious celestial palace in the sky,

original: rlung la rgyu ste 'on kyang rlung gis 'phrogs pa min //
analyzed: rlung la rgyu ste 'on kyang rlung gis 'phrogs pa min //
translated: Moving in the wind, but not blown away by the wind.

original: de ltar 'gro ba'i don spyod 'jig rten chos spyod kyang //
analyzed: de ltar 'gro ba'i don spyod 'jig rten chos spyod kyang //
translated: In the same way, they practice for the sake of beings, but worldly phenomena do not affect them,

original: ji ltar padmo chus mi chags bzhin 'phrogs pa min //
analyzed: ji ltar padmo chus mi chags bzhin 'phrogs pa min //
translated: Like a lotus that is not attached to water.

original: 'di la gnas pa dga' ldan dbang po mkhas par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa dga' ldan dbang po mkhas par 'gyur //
translated: Those who abide in this become skilled in the pleasures of Tuṣita,

original: mu stegs spyod dang lta ba mang po'i gnas kyang sel //
analyzed: mu stegs spyod dang lta ba mang po'i gnas kyang sel //
translated: And dispel the many tīrthika practices and views.

original: stobs rnams bcu po sems can bskyab par bya'o zhes //
analyzed: stobs rnams bcu po sems can bskyab par bya'o zhes //
translated: The ten powers, in order to protect beings,

original: dge ba de dag rgyal ba'i ye shes don du rtsom //
analyzed: dge ba de dag rgyal ba'i ye shes don du rtsom //
translated: they undertake these virtues for the sake of the Victor’s wisdom.

original: 'di na sa gong du brtson 'grus rtsom byed mthu thob pa //
analyzed: 'di na sa gong du brtson 'grus rtsom byed mthu thob pa //
translated: Here, on the higher grounds, they attain the power to undertake diligence

original: khrag khrig @142b bye ba stong gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed //
analyzed: khrag khrig @142b bye ba stong gi bde gshegs mchod pa byed //
translated: and make offerings to the sugatas of a billion worlds.

original: ting 'dzin thob nas khrag khrig zhing yangs mkhas pas bskyod //
analyzed: ting 'dzin thob nas khrag khrig zhing yangs mkhas pas bskyod //
translated: Having attained meditative absorption, the wise ones move to a billion vast realms.

original: yan chad smon lam khyad par yon tan 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: yan chad smon lam khyad par yon tan 'byung gnas so //
translated: From here on, the grounds are the source of special qualities and aspirations.

original: de ltar sa mchog lnga pa 'di //
analyzed: de ltar sa mchog lnga pa 'di //
translated: Thus, this fifth supreme ground

original: thabs kyi rnam pa khrag khrig gis //
analyzed: thabs kyi rnam pa khrag khrig gis //
translated: is taught by the Victor’s heirs

original: sems can gtso la yang dag tu //🔽rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin //
analyzed: sems can gtso la yang dag tu // rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin //
translated: to the chief of beings

original: shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: through a billion aspects of method.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'o //
translated: This completes the fifth bodhichitta generation from the Entrance to the Middle Way.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog spyod pa rab thob nas //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog spyod pa rab thob nas //
translated: The wise ones, having attained the supreme conduct,

original: rgyal sras dga' zhing mkha' las me tog char 'bebs so //
analyzed: rgyal sras dga' zhing mkha' las me tog char 'bebs so //
translated: rejoice and cause a rain of flowers to fall from the sky.

original: nor bu rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal rgya chen 'byung ba dag /
analyzed: nor bu rin chen rnam dag 'od gsal rgya chen 'byung ba dag /
translated: “The pure precious jewel, the vast clear light,

original: bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor dge zhes rnam par brjod //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor dge zhes rnam par brjod //
translated: is scattered upon the Sugata, and is called ‘virtue.’

original: lha rnams brgya phrag stong grangs dga' zhing bar snang las //🔽lha rdzas yid 'ong rin chen sna tshogs phye ma'i rnams //
analyzed: lha rnams brgya phrag stong grangs dga' zhing bar snang las // lha rdzas yid 'ong rin chen sna tshogs phye ma'i rnams //
translated: Hundreds of thousands of gods, rejoicing,🔽from the sky scatter divine precious powders,

original: bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor byug pa phreng ba spos //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs la mngon 'thor byug pa phreng ba spos //
translated: which are beautiful and various, and also anointments, garlands, and incense,

original: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan se mo do yang 'bul //
analyzed: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan se mo do yang 'bul //
translated: and parasols, victory banners, flags, and necklaces.🔽The lord of gods, Vaishravana, with a multitude of gods,

original: lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur lha tshogs mang po dang // steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod cing rin chen sprin yangs pa //
analyzed: lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur lha tshogs mang po dang // steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod cing rin chen sprin yangs pa //
translated: in the sky above, with a vast cloud of jewels,

original: rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du bde bar gshegs la 'thor //
analyzed: rgyal ba mchod pa'i don du bde bar gshegs la 'thor //
translated: scatters it upon the Sugata in order to make offerings to the Victor.

original: dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal sras legs zhes rnam par brjod //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal sras legs zhes rnam par brjod //
translated: With a joyful mind, he proclaims, ‘Excellent, son of the Victor!’

original: bar snang gnas las lha yi bu mo stong gis kyang //
analyzed: bar snang gnas las lha yi bu mo stong gis kyang //
translated: A thousand celestial maidens, from their place in the sky,

original: glu dbyangs yid 'ong rol mo'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa phyung //
analyzed: glu dbyangs yid 'ong rol mo'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa phyung //
translated: sing beautiful songs and play sweet sounds on musical instruments.

original: sgra rnams kun gyi dbyangs las 'di skad tshig kyang byung //
analyzed: sgra rnams kun gyi dbyangs las 'di skad tshig kyang byung //
translated: And the words of this verse came forth from the sound of all music.

original: @143a *// rgyal ba'i gsung ni yid 'ong nyon mongs gdung ba sel //
analyzed: @143a *// rgyal ba'i gsung ni yid 'ong nyon mongs gdung ba sel //
translated: The speech of the Victorious One is pleasant and removes the torment of disturbing emotions.

original: chos rnams thams cad stong zhing dngos zhi mtshan ma med //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad stong zhing dngos zhi mtshan ma med //
translated: All phenomena are empty, peaceful, and without characteristics.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs mnyam rnam dag rnam mi rtog /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs mnyam rnam dag rnam mi rtog /
translated: They are equal to and the same as the realm of space, pure and nonconceptual.

original: 'gro dang gnas las rnam 'das ma lus spros pa med //
analyzed: 'gro dang gnas las rnam 'das ma lus spros pa med //
translated: They are beyond going and staying, and are completely free of elaboration.

original: de bzhin nyid du chos rnams yang dag mnyam mi rtog /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du chos rnams yang dag mnyam mi rtog /
translated: In suchness, phenomena are not conceptualized as being real or equal.

original: chos rnams kun la snang ba khong du sus chud pa //
analyzed: chos rnams kun la snang ba khong du sus chud pa //
translated: Whoever understands the illumination of all phenomena

original: de la dngos dang dngos med g-yo ba gang yang med //
analyzed: de la dngos dang dngos med g-yo ba gang yang med //
translated: Has no movement whatsoever toward things or nonthings.

original: snying rje brtse bas 'gro ba dgrol phyir brtson pa ni //
analyzed: snying rje brtse bas 'gro ba dgrol phyir brtson pa ni //
translated: With compassionate love, they strive to liberate beings.

original: de dang de dag rgyal sras chos kyi sku skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de dang de dag rgyal sras chos kyi sku skyes pa'o //
translated: They are born from the dharmakāya of the Victorious Ones.

original: mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing sbyin pa'i spyad pa spyod //
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad spangs shing sbyin pa'i spyad pa spyod //
translated: They practice generosity while abandoning all characteristics.

original: tshul khrims shin tu sems dam sngon nas zhi zhing dul //
analyzed: tshul khrims shin tu sems dam sngon nas zhi zhing dul //
translated: Their discipline is pure, and their minds are peaceful and disciplined from the beginning.

original: 'gro ba'i don du chos kyi ye shes ma nyams bzod //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don du chos kyi ye shes ma nyams bzod //
translated: For the sake of beings, they have the patience of unimpaired wisdom of the Dharma.

original: brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan zhing chos rnams kun gyis dben //
analyzed: brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan zhing chos rnams kun gyis dben //
translated: They have the strength of diligence and are free from all phenomena.

original: nyon mongs bsal cing rnam dag bsam gtan tshul la zhugs //
analyzed: nyon mongs bsal cing rnam dag bsam gtan tshul la zhugs //
translated: They have eliminated the afflictions and have pure, correct meditation.

original: dngos po thams cad snga nas zhi zhing rnam par phye //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad snga nas zhi zhing rnam par phye //
translated: All things are from the beginning peaceful and separated.

original: ye shes spyod dang stobs phyug rtag tu 'gro don brtson //
analyzed: ye shes spyod dang stobs phyug rtag tu 'gro don brtson //
translated: They have the power of wisdom and conduct and are always diligent in benefiting beings.

original: rgyal sras de dag sdig zhi che ba nyid dang ldan //
analyzed: rgyal sras de dag sdig zhi che ba nyid dang ldan //
translated: Those bodhisattvas have the greatness of pacifying evil.

original: de skad sgra dbyangs snyan pa stong grangs brjod byas nas //
analyzed: de skad sgra dbyangs snyan pa stong grangs brjod byas nas //
translated: Having spoken these thousands of melodious sounds,

original: lha yi bu mo mi smra dad par thub la lta //
analyzed: lha yi bu mo mi smra dad par thub la lta //
translated: the celestial maidens remained silent and gazed at the Sage with faith.🔽Then Vimukti candra asked

original: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la //🔽thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la // thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa //
translated: the fearless Vajra garbha,🔽“What are the aspects of the accomplishment

original: sa mchog lnga yi gong ma @143b de; ;rnam pa ci 'dras 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa mchog lnga yi gong ma @143b de; ;rnam pa ci 'dras 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: of the stage above the fifth supreme stage?”

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vajra garbha said,

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva who has completed the path of the fifth ground

original: byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la 'jug go /
translated: enters the sixth bodhisattva ground.

original: de chos mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug ste /
analyzed: de chos mnyam pa nyid bcus 'jug ste /
translated: He does so through ten equalities of phenomena.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dben pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dben pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: They are as follows:🔽The equality of all phenomena in being without signs, the equality of all phenomena in being without characteristics, the equality of all phenomena in being unborn, the equality of all phenomena in being unarisen, the equality of all phenomena in being void,

original: chos thams cad snga nas rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spros pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad snga nas rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spros pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /
translated: the equality of all phenomena in being primordially pure, the equality of all phenomena in being free from elaborations, the equality of all phenomena in being free from adoption and rejection, the equality of all phenomena in being like an illusion,

original: rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / sgra brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dngos po yod pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / sgra brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa dang mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad dngos po yod pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: illusions, echoes, the moon in the water, reflections, and emanations; and the sameness of all phenomena in being neither existent nor nonexistent nor both.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: chos mnyam pa nyid bcu po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid bcu po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la 'jug go /
translated: through these ten samenesses, bodhisattvas enter the sixth bhumi.

original: de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar rab tu rtog cing spyod @144a *//
analyzed: de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de 'dra bar rab tu rtog cing spyod @144a *//
translated: “They thoroughly understand that all phenomena are by nature like that, and they think in accordance with that conduct.

original: pa dang mthun par sems shing mi mthun par mi byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa mthun pa'i bzod pa rnon pos 'thob ste /
analyzed: pa dang mthun par sems shing mi mthun par mi byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa mthun pa'i bzod pa rnon pos 'thob ste /
translated: Since they do not act in a way that is not in accordance with that, they attain the sixth bodhisattva bhumi, Good and Worthy, through sharp acceptance that is in accordance with that.

original: 'on kyang da dung mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa mngon du gyur pa ni thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang da dung mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa mngon du gyur pa ni thob pa ma yin no //
translated: However, they have not yet attained the actual acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena.

original: de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de ltar rtog pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de chos thams cad la rang bzhin de ltar rtog pa'i tshe /
translated: “When they thoroughly understand that all phenomena are by nature like that,

original: de bas kyang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang; snying rje chen po la dbang bsgyur bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas kyang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang; snying rje chen po la dbang bsgyur bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, with great compassion preceding and with great compassion being mastered, great compassion is perfected.

original: 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la rnam par lta'o //🔽de 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la lta ba'i tshe /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la rnam par lta'o // de 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa la lta ba'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, in order to perfect great compassion, he views the origination and destruction of the world, preceded by great compassion, and having brought great compassion into his very nature.

original: 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: 'di snyam ste /
translated: When he views the origination and destruction of the world, he thinks to himself:

original: 'jig rten kun tu rgyu ba'i skye ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag tu mngon par shes pa las 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten kun tu rgyu ba'i skye ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag tu mngon par shes pa las 'byung ste /
translated: “Whatever kinds of birth there are in the world, all of them arise from the notion of self.

original: bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang bral na 'byung ba yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang bral na 'byung ba yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one were free from the notion of self, there would be no birth.

original: byis pa'i blo can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa /
analyzed: byis pa'i blo can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa /
translated: The childish, who are attached to the notion of self,

original: mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa yod pa dang med pa la mngon par mos pa /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis bsgribs pa yod pa dang med pa la mngon par mos pa /
translated: are obscured by the darkness of ignorance, and are devoted to the notion of existence and nonexistence.

original: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gzhol ba /
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gzhol ba /
translated: They are devoted to incorrect mental activity,

original: yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: and they are engaged in what is unreal.

original: log pa'i rjes su 'brang ba de dag ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar gsog ste /
analyzed: log pa'i rjes su 'brang ba de dag ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed nye bar gsog ste /
translated: Those who follow wrong paths accumulate the formations of merit and demerit.

original: 'du byed de dag gis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi sa bon zag pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'du byed de dag gis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi sa bon zag pa dang bcas pa /
translated: The seed of the mind that is moistened by those formations

original: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa ni /
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa ni /
translated: is accompanied by defilements and appropriation.

original: @144b ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga shi dang / yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa 'byung ba nye bar song ba yin te /
analyzed: @144b ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga shi dang / yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa 'byung ba nye bar song ba yin te /
translated: It is the source of the arising of future birth, old age, death, and existence.

original: las kyi zhing gi gzhi dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / sred pa'i snum dang; nga'i nga rgyal gyis brlan pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / dra ba rab tu 'phel bas ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu 'byung ste /
analyzed: las kyi zhing gi gzhi dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / sred pa'i snum dang; nga'i nga rgyal gyis brlan pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / dra ba rab tu 'phel bas ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu 'byung ste /
translated: The seed of name-and-form arises from the field of karma, the darkness of ignorance, the oil of craving, the moisture of the pride of “I” and “mine,” and the spreading of the net of views.

original: byung nas rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: byung nas rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: Once it has arisen, it grows.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel nas /🔽dbang po lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel nas / dbang po lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Once the seed of name-and-form has grown,🔽the five faculties arise.

original: dbang po lnga byung nas /
analyzed: dbang po lnga byung nas /
translated: Once the five faculties have arisen,

original: phan tshun 'dus shing phrad pas reg par 'gyur ro //🔽reg pa 'dus pas tshor ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: phan tshun 'dus shing phrad pas reg par 'gyur ro // reg pa 'dus pas tshor ba 'byung ngo //
translated: Through mutual contact, there is contact.🔽Through the contact of contact, there is feeling.

original: tshor ba de'i rjes su mngon par smon pas sred pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba de'i rjes su mngon par smon pas sred pa 'byung ngo //
translated: After feeling, there is craving.

original: sred pa ni nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: sred pa ni nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel bar byed do //
translated: Craving increases appropriation.🔽From the increase of appropriation, there is becoming.

original: nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel ba las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;srid pa byung nas phung po lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa rnam par 'phel ba las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;srid pa byung nas phung po lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: From becoming, there is the arising of the five aggregates.

original: phung po lnga byung nas lam gyi rgyud lngar rim gyis dengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phung po lnga byung nas lam gyi rgyud lngar rim gyis dengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: From the arising of the five aggregates, there is the gradual passing through the five paths.

original: dengs nas 'bral bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dengs nas 'bral bar 'gyur te /
translated: Having passed, there is separation.

original: dengs shing bral bas mi dga' zhing yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dengs shing bral bas mi dga' zhing yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having passed and separated, there is unhappiness and distress.

original: mi dga' ba dang yongs su gdung ba'i rgyus mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'byung bar 'gyur yang de dag las su yang 'byung bar byed pa med do //🔽rang bzhin dang lhun gyis grub par 'jig par 'gyur yang de dag la 'jig @145a *//
analyzed: mi dga' ba dang yongs su gdung ba'i rgyus mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'byung bar 'gyur yang de dag las su yang 'byung bar byed pa med do // rang bzhin dang lhun gyis grub par 'jig par 'gyur yang de dag la 'jig @145a *//
translated: and from the cause of not liking and being distressed, there is sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and despair. But there is no one who does any of that.

original: par byed pa su yang med do //
analyzed: par byed pa su yang med do //
translated: They are naturally and spontaneously destroyed, and there is no one who destroys them.

original: zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lugs su mthun par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rab tu rtog go /🔽de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lugs su mthun par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rab tu rtog go / de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva examines the forward progression of dependent origination.

original: bden pa mngon par mi shes pa ni yang dag par ma rig pa ste /
analyzed: bden pa mngon par mi shes pa ni yang dag par ma rig pa ste /
translated: He thinks, ‘Not knowing the truth is ignorance.

original: ma rig pas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: ma rig pas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'du byed rnams so //
translated: The ripening of the karma created by ignorance is formations.

original: 'du byed la gnas pa'i sems dang po ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la gnas pa'i sems dang po ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The first mind that abides in formations is consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu skyes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs so; ;ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni skye mched drug go /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu skyes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi ni ming dang gzugs so; ;ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni skye mched drug go /
translated: The development of name-and-form is the six sense spheres.

original: dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum phrad pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum phrad pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni reg pa'o //
translated: The contact of the three—sense faculty, object, and consciousness—is contaminated contact.

original: reg pa'i rjes las skyes pa ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i rjes las skyes pa ni tshor ba'o //
translated: That which arises after contact is feeling.

original: tshor ba la chags pa ni sred pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la chags pa ni sred pa'o //
translated: Attachment to feeling is craving.

original: sred pa rnam par 'phel ba ni nye bar len pa'o //🔽nye bar len pa las byung ba'i las zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa rnam par 'phel ba ni nye bar len pa'o // nye bar len pa las byung ba'i las zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'o //
translated: The development of craving is grasping.🔽The contaminated action that arises from grasping is becoming.

original: las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni skye ba'o //
translated: The result that is in accordance with the cause is birth.

original: skye ba ni phung po 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba ni phung po 'byung ba'o //
translated: Birth is the arising of the aggregates.

original: phung po yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o //
analyzed: phung po yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o //
translated: The ripening of the aggregates is aging.

original: rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o; ;'chi zhing 'bral ba'i tshe myos shing chags par 'gyur ba'i sems la yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to //
analyzed: rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o; ;'chi zhing 'bral ba'i tshe myos shing chags par 'gyur ba'i sems la yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to //
translated: Old age is the decay of the body. Death is the destruction of the body. Sorrow is the mental anguish of one who is dying and being separated from what he loves.

original: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu brjod pa ni smre sngags 'don @145b pa'o; ;dbang po lnga'i nyams su bab pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu brjod pa ni smre sngags 'don @145b pa'o; ;dbang po lnga'i nyams su bab pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Lamentation is the expression of sorrow in words. Pain is the suffering of the five senses.

original: yid kyis lta ba'i nyams su bab ni yid mi bde ba'o //
analyzed: yid kyis lta ba'i nyams su bab ni yid mi bde ba'o //
translated: Mental pain is the suffering of the mind.

original: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po byung ba ni 'khrug pa ste; de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdong po 'ba' zhig byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po byung ba ni 'khrug pa ste; de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdong po 'ba' zhig byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sorrow and lamentation are the great mass of suffering, the tree of suffering, the origin of suffering, the source of suffering, the production of suffering, the production of the mass of suffering.

original: de 'di snyam du sems te; byed pa po la mngon par chags pas las rnams yod par gyur te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te; byed pa po la mngon par chags pas las rnams yod par gyur te /
translated: He thinks: “Actions exist because of attachment to the agent.

original: gang na byed pa po med pa de na don dam par na las kyang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang na byed pa po med pa de na don dam par na las kyang mi dmigs so //
translated: Where there is no agent, ultimately no action is perceived.”

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks as follows:

original: 'di ltar khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam ste /
translated: “This threefold world is mind only.

original: gang 'di srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phye ste bka' stsal ba de dag thams cad kyang sems gcig la gnas pa dag go /
analyzed: gang 'di srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu phye ste bka' stsal ba de dag thams cad kyang sems gcig la gnas pa dag go /
translated: All these twelve members of existence, which the Tathāgata has distinguished, are based on one mind.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: dngos po gang la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyes pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po gang la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyes pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The mind that arises in relation to a thing and is endowed with passion is consciousness.

original: dngos po ni 'du byed do //
analyzed: dngos po ni 'du byed do //
translated: The thing is the formations.

original: 'du byed la mgo rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la mgo rmongs pa ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: The confusion of the formations is ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i sems dang lhan cig skyes pa ni ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i sems dang lhan cig skyes pa ni ming dang gzugs so //
translated: The name-and-form arises together with the mind of ignorance.

original: ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drug gi skye mched do //🔽dgru gi skye mchod dang 'brel ba ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel ba ni drug gi skye mched do // dgru gi skye mchod dang 'brel ba ni reg pa'o //
translated: The development of name-and-form is the six sense-spheres.🔽The connection of the six sense-spheres is contact.

original: reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ni tshor ba'o //
translated: Contact arising together with the sense-spheres is feeling.

original: tshor bas mi ngoms pa ni sred pa'o //
analyzed: tshor bas mi ngoms pa ni sred pa'o //
translated: The non-satisfaction of feeling is craving.

original: sred pas mnar te sdug cing mi gtong ba ni nye @146a *//
analyzed: sred pas mnar te sdug cing mi gtong ba ni nye @146a *//
translated: The torment of craving is grasping.

original: bar len pa'o //🔽srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: bar len pa'o // srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba 'di dag ni srid pa'o //
translated: and the middle is appropriation.🔽The arising of the members of existence is existence.

original: srid pa 'byung ba ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa 'byung ba ni skye ba'o //
translated: The arising of existence is birth.

original: skye ba yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba yongs su smin pa ni rga ba'o //
translated: The ripening of birth is old age.

original: rga ba dang bral ba ni 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: rga ba dang bral ba ni 'chi ba'o //
translated: The separation of old age is death.

original: de la ma rig pa ni bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: de la ma rig pa ni bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Ignorance has two functions:

original: sems can rnams kyang dmigs pa la rmongs par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang dmigs pa la rmongs par byed do //
translated: it causes beings to be confused about their objects,

original: 'du byed mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: 'du byed mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and it produces the cause for the formation of action.🔽Action has two functions:

original: 'du byed rnams kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: it produces the cause for the formation of consciousness,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa yang mngon par 'grub par byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par smin pa yang mngon par 'grub par byed do // rnam par shes pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and it produces the cause for the formation of future ripening.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Consciousness has two functions:

original: srid pa'i nying gi mtshams kyang sbyor ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i nying gi mtshams kyang sbyor ro //
translated: it establishes the connection with a new existence,🔽and it produces the cause for the formation of name-and-form.

original: ming dang gzugs mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: Name-and-form has two functions:🔽it produces the cause for the formation of the six sense-spheres,🔽and it produces the cause for the formation of the six senses.🔽The six senses have two functions:🔽they produce the cause for the formation of contact,🔽and they produce the cause for the formation of feeling.🔽Contact has two functions:🔽it produces the cause for the formation of craving,🔽and it produces the cause for the formation of grasping.🔽Grasping has two functions:🔽it produces the cause for the formation of becoming,🔽and it produces the cause for the formation of birth.🔽Birth has two functions:🔽it produces the cause for the formation of old age,🔽and it produces the cause for the formation of death.🔽Old age has two functions:🔽it produces the cause for the formation of sorrow,🔽and it produces the cause for the formation of lamentation.🔽Sorrow and lamentation have two functions:🔽they produce the cause for the formation of pain,🔽and they produce the cause for the formation of despair.

original: ming dang gzugs kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /🔽phan tshun nye bar rton par yang byed do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te / phan tshun nye bar rton par yang byed do //
translated: Name-and-form also has two actions:🔽it causes the mutual support of the six sense bases;

original: skye mched drug mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: skye mched drug mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and it causes the production of the six sense bases.

original: drug gi skye mched kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: drug gi skye mched kyang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: The six sense bases also have two actions:

original: rang gi yul rnam par phye ba yang ston to //
analyzed: rang gi yul rnam par phye ba yang ston to //
translated: they cause the manifestation of their own objects;

original: reg pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: reg pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and they cause the production of contact.

original: reg pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: reg pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Contact also has two actions:

original: dmigs pa la reg par yang byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa la reg par yang byed do //
translated: it causes contact with the object;

original: tshor ba mngon par 'grub @146b pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: tshor ba mngon par 'grub @146b pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and it causes the production of feeling.

original: tshor ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: tshor ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /

analyzed: yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin par tshor ba yang skyed do //

analyzed: sred pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //

original: sred pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: sred pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Craving also performs two functions:

analyzed: chags par 'gyur ba'i dngos po la mngon par chags par yang byed do //

original: nye bar len pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: nye bar len pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and it produces the cause for the actualization of grasping.

original: nye bar len pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Grasping also performs two functions:

original: kun nas nyon mongs pas 'ching bar yang byed do //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pas 'ching bar yang byed do //

original: srid pa mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: srid pa mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and it produces the cause for the actualization of becoming.

original: srid pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: srid pa yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /

original: skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: and it produces the cause for the actualization of birth.

original: skye ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: skye ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Birth also performs two functions:

original: phung po 'byung bar yang byed do //🔽rga ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: phung po 'byung bar yang byed do // rga ba mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
translated: it causes the aggregates to come into being;🔽and it produces the cause for the actualization of aging.

original: rga ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: rga ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Aging also performs two functions:

original: dbang po yongs su 'gyur bar yang byed do //
analyzed: dbang po yongs su 'gyur bar yang byed do //
translated: It also causes the faculties to change.

original: 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to //
analyzed: 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang 'byin to //

original: 'chi ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'chi ba yang bya ba gnyis su nye bar gnas pa yin te /
translated: Death is present in two activities.

original: 'du byed 'jig par yang byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed 'jig par yang byed do //
translated: It also causes the destruction of formations.

original: yongs su ma shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to //🔽de la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed @147a *//
analyzed: yongs su ma shes pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu yang 'byin to // de la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed @147a *//
translated: It also causes the causes of the continuity of ignorance.

original: rnams so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnams so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Here, the condition of ignorance is formations” means

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: that the condition of ignorance is the continuity and support of formations.🔽“The condition of formations is consciousness” means

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni; 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba ni; 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: that the condition of formations is the continuity and support of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The condition of consciousness is name and form” means

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: that the condition of consciousness is the continuity and support of name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched ces bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of name-and-form is the six sense spheres.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis drug gi skye mched rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: The condition of name-and-form is the uninterrupted and continuous six sense spheres.

original: drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of the six sense spheres is contact.

original: drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen gyis reg pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: The condition of the six sense spheres is the uninterrupted and continuous contact.

original: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of contact is feeling.

original: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: The condition of contact is the uninterrupted and continuous feeling.

original: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of feeling is craving.

original: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: The condition of feeling is the uninterrupted and continuous craving.

original: sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of craving is grasping.

original: sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen gyis nye bar len pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: The condition of craving is the uninterrupted and continuous grasping.

original: nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis sred pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of grasping is becoming.🔽The condition of grasping is the uninterrupted and continuous becoming.

original: nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: The condition of appropriation is the uninterrupted and continuous reliance on becoming.

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of becoming is birth.🔽The condition of becoming is the uninterrupted and continuous reliance on birth.

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton @147b pa'o; ;skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba rgyun mi 'chad cing rton @147b pa'o; ;skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The condition of birth is aging and death.

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi rgyun mi 'chad cing rton pa'o //
translated: The condition of birth is the uninterrupted and continuous reliance on aging and death.

original: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag go zhes bya ba de ni /
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag go zhes bya ba de ni /
translated: The cessation of ignorance is the cessation of the formative factors.

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen med pas 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen med pas 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the condition of ignorance is the peace and absence of reliance on the formative factors.

original: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The cessation of the formative factors is the cessation of consciousness.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen med pas rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen med pas rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the condition of the formative factors is the peace and absence of reliance on consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The cessation of consciousness is the cessation of name-and-form.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med pas ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen med pas ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since there are no conditions for consciousness, name and form are completely extinguished and are not relied upon.

original: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas drug gi skye mched 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas drug gi skye mched 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since name and form cease, the six sense sources cease.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen med pas drug gi skye mched nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen med pas drug gi skye mched nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since there are no conditions for name and form, the six sense sources are completely extinguished and are not relied upon.

original: drug gi skye mched 'gags pas reg pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: drug gi skye mched 'gags pas reg pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since the six sense sources cease, contact ceases.

original: drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen med pas reg pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: drug gi skye mched kyi rkyen med pas reg pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since there are no conditions for the six sense sources, contact is completely extinguished and is not relied upon.

original: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since contact ceases, feeling ceases.

original: reg pa'i rkyen med pas tshor ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i rkyen med pas tshor ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since there are no conditions for contact, feeling is completely extinguished and is not relied upon.

original: tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since feeling ceases, craving ceases.

original: tshor ba'i rkyen med pas sred pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen med pas sred pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since there are no conditions for feeling, craving is completely extinguished and is not relied upon.

original: sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since craving ceases, grasping ceases.

original: sred pa'i rkyen med pas len pa nye @148a *//
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen med pas len pa nye @148a *//
translated: Since there are no conditions for craving, there is no grasping.🔽

original: bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since the condition of craving does not exist, grasping is completely pacified and does not continue.🔽Since grasping does not exist, becoming is completely pacified and does not continue.

original: nye bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nye bar len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since grasping ceases, becoming ceases.

original: nye bar len pa'i rkyen med pas srid pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i rkyen med pas srid pa nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since the condition of grasping does not exist, becoming is completely pacified and does not continue.

original: srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since becoming ceases, birth ceases.

original: srid pa'i rkyen med pas skye ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen med pas skye ba nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since the condition of becoming does not exist, birth is completely pacified and does not continue.

original: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Since birth ceases, aging and death cease.

original: skye ba'i rkyen med pas rga shi nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen med pas rga shi nye bar zhi zhing rton pa med pa'o //
translated: Since the condition of birth does not exist, aging and death are completely pacified and do not continue.

original: de la ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa ni /
analyzed: de la ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa ni /
translated: Among them, ignorance, craving, and grasping🔽are the uninterrupted continuum of the path of afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pa'i lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o; ;'du byed dang / srid pa ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o; ;'du byed dang / srid pa ni /

original: las kyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: are the uninterrupted continuum of the path of karma.

original: lhag ma rnams ni /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni /
translated: The rest

original: sdug bsngal gyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: are the uninterrupted continuum of the path of suffering.

original: rab tu rnam par phye bas sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' 'gags pas lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu rnam par phye bas sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' 'gags pas lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: The path is distinguished by the cessation of the prior limit and the posterior limit.

original: de ltar lam 'di gsum ni bdag med cing bdag dang bdag gi dang bral bar 'byung zhing 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar lam 'di gsum ni bdag med cing bdag dang bdag gi dang bral bar 'byung zhing 'jig pa ste /
translated: These three paths are devoid of self and what belongs to a self, and they arise and cease.

original: rang bzhin gyis mdud khyim lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis mdud khyim lta bu'o //
translated: They are like a house of cards.

original: de ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: Thus, “with ignorance as condition, there are the conditioning factors”

original: sngon gyi mtha' la bltas pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' la bltas pa'o //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / drug gi skye mched dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba 'di dag ni /
translated: Consciousness, name and form, the six sense spheres, contact, and feeling

original: da ltar byung ba la bltas pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba la bltas pa'o //
translated: are said with reference to the present.

analyzed: sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa dang / @148b skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: Craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death

original: phyi ma'i mtha' la bltas pa ste /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' la bltas pa ste /
translated: are said with reference to the posterior limit.

analyzed: de phan chad du yang de dag rgyun du 'byung ngo //

analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni blta ba rgyun chad pa ste /
translated: The statement, “Through the cessation of ignorance, the conditioning factors cease” indicates the cessation of the continuum of views.

analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //

analyzed: yang 'di ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi rgyus sdug bsngal gsum 'byung ste /
translated: Moreover, the three kinds of suffering arise from the causes of these twelve members of dependent origination.

original: de la ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / drug gi skye mched ces bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal lo //

translated: Among them, ignorance, the conditioning factors, consciousness, name and form, and the six sense bases constitute the suffering of conditioned existence.

analyzed: reg pa dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi yang sdug bsngal lo //

analyzed: sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba nas 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and the remaining members up to “disturbance” constitute the suffering of change.

original: ma rig ba 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi rgyun 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig ba 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag ces bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi rgyun 'chad pa'o //
translated: The statement, “Through the cessation of ignorance, the conditioning factors cease” indicates the cessation of the continuum of the three kinds of suffering.

analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni 'du byed rnams rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste /
translated: “Conditioned by ignorance, there are volitions” means that volitions arise from causes and conditions.

original: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the rest.

original: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni 'du byed rnams med pa ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni 'du byed rnams med pa ste /
translated: “When ignorance ceases, volitions cease” means that volitions do not exist.

original: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the rest.

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni skye ba rnam par 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni skye ba rnam par 'brel ba ste /
translated: “Conditioned by ignorance, there are volitions” means that birth is related.

original: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the rest.

analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba ni 'jig pa rnam par 'brel @149a *//
translated: “When ignorance ceases, volitions cease” means that destruction is related.

original: ba ste / lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ba ste / lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the rest.

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni srid pa lugs su mthun par brtag pa ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni srid pa lugs su mthun par brtag pa ste /
translated: “Conditioned by ignorance, there are volitions” means that becoming is related in a forward order.

original: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the rest.

original: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ni zad pa dang / 'jig pa'i lugs su mthun par brtag pa ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ni zad pa dang / 'jig pa'i lugs su mthun par brtag pa ste /
